name: FatalZone
description: FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements set in a savage world of zombies. Exterminate zombie hordes, collect resources, upgrade your camp, and level up mercenaries. Humanity must survive at any cost!

name: Beach Vacation Simulator
description: Welcome to Beach Vacation Simulator, the cutting-edge simulator that offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility. Immerse yourself in a virtual paradise where your only priority is to take in the sights and sounds of the waves and wind brushing against the beach.

name: Dart Racer
description: Dart Racer is an immersive VR arcade racing game set in a futuristic galaxy obsessed with speed. Master the intuitive controls, fine-tune your dart, and compete in thrilling races across a variety of strange environments.

name: RogueOut
description: RogueOut is a fresh take on Breakout with roguelike elements. Wield powerful balls, strategize against dynamic bricks, and explore unique mechanics in each playthrough. This strategic, arcade-style game redefines the classic, promising endless replayability and thrill.

name: Racketeers
description: Form the most infamous criminal organization you can. Engage in numerous rackets, hire underlings, defend your turf, brew and mix contraband to distribute, run brothels, whack rival gangsters. Manage your criminal empire to earn millions. Become the most feared of the RACKETEERS!

name: Two Cubes
description: Two Cubes is an Online Co-Op, puzzle-platformer where players can only touch their colour!

name: Intergalactic Mystery
description: Embark on an epic adventure with Duke and Floc, fighting in alien worlds, unraveling cosmic secrets, and challenging bosses in search of the celestial origins of an enigmatic Alien. RPG, adventure, shooting, and NPC interaction. Get ready for intense action!

name: Boxing Simulator
description: Boxing Simulator is a 3D, Strategy, Simulator, Action, Fighter, Fist Fight, Boxing game.

name: The Mind's Decay
description: "The Mind's Decay" is a story-driven psychological horror game where Mark finds himself trapped in a cryptic, broken world.

name: Plague Attack the World
description: A game where you roam and defend the world from a plague of mutant flies!

name: Robot TD
description: Get ready to defend from murderous robots. Use your cast of towers to defend from the robots in this 3D strategy game.

name: Swift by Knight
description: Swift by Knight is a 2D platformer that puts you in control of Jack, the Nimble Knight, on a quest for speed and precision. Bounce off enemies, grapple, and utilize the unique level mechanics to navigate with speed and finesse.

name: Hakan's War Manager
description: Football Manager meets Total War. It's a tactical wargame blended with a manager simulation. As the tactician of your clan, your mission is to lead them to victory in the "War League" competition. Set tactics, battle, manage, scout, train, and more...

name: Space Nation Online
description: Start a universe voyage around the mysteriously splendid cluster of Telikos in Space Nation Online, the space opera MMORPG. Create your own tale and unveil the mysteries behind acute conficts among various factions and alien species.

name: Ratyrinth
description: You are drastically separated from your family in a scary forest with dangerous creatures, and you have to find them again! Ratyrinth is a cute and challenging precision platformer.

name: Talker Tales
description: In Talker Tales, a roguelike deck-building game, there's no combat, only verbal sparring! Travel with your apprentice, collect debate cards and wooden automata, and use them to cleverly "persuade" rebellious lords and bring peace to the land.

name: Aexia
description: Aexia is a platform for creating, sharing and playing VR role-playing games. With Aexia, players can role-play as actual actors in a movie set.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Mists of Ravenloft
description: Mists of Ravenloft is DDO's third expansion. The expansion will immerse you in one of the most infamous D&D adventure settings. Save the people of Barovia, slay Strahd, and restore balance to the land. The stakes have never been higher!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Masterminds of Sharn
description: Masterminds of Sharn is DDO's forth expansion. It gives the player the ability to travel from Stormreach to the city of Sharn on the continent of Khorvaire. It also adds the Masterminds of Sharn adventure pack. The chain involves the recovery of the item that was recovered in the quest that was added in Update 41, while avoiding a conflict with the Aurum, the Boromar Clan, and Sharn's city council. The expansion also added the teifling race, the teifling scoundrel iconic race, and the inquisitive enhancement tree.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fables of the Feywild
description: Fables of the Feywild is DDO's fifth expansion. Journey to the land of myth and fable, a place of wonder and death in Dungeons & Dragons Online: Fables of the Feywild. Meet the Archfey, mighty beings who may help or hinder you on your adventures. Encounter majestic Unicorns, mischievous Pixies, deadly Displacer Beasts, and fierce Fomorians in this all new expansion!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh
description: Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh mini-expansion was introduced in Update 50. An evil Alchemist's mansion stands alone on a cliff and mysterious lights and hauntings have kept people away despite rumors of great treasure.

name: Heaven's Dream
description: Become an incubus and enter a girl's dream! As an incubus, you need to enter a girl's dream to get energy in order to live. That energy is sexual pleasure energy. The desires that girls hide... I want to be forced i want to be violent Satisfy the girl's hidden desires!

name: Tap Romantics
description: In this casual strategy game, become a clever warrior, eliminate monsters by clicking, accumulate attack power, battle against beautiful girl enemies, earn talent points and exquisite CG rewards, and challenge your decision-making wisdom and combat skills!

name: Trippy's Disc Golf
description: Trippy's Disc Golf: Immerse yourself in an open-world environment and conquer challenging courses. Throw discs, master precision, and explore stunning landscapes.

name: Maginet
description: Maginet is a turn-based abstract strategy game where two guilds of mages battle each other. Dominate the arena with your wit and wisdom, play locally with friends and against the AI, or online across the world!

name: Unnamed Space Idle
description: Destroy endless waves of alien ships that have all but wiped out humanity in this long form, unfolding, sci-fi idle game. Customize your ship with different weapons and defenses to defeat specific enemy types and utilize a ton of different systems to increase your overall power.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV
description:
Hercules was peacefully napping aboard a ship when a gentle breeze turned out to be a storm. The hero’s boat tossed to unknown shores and ripped to shreds. While Hercules was unconscious, a tiny folk gathered around him and… decided to tie the demigod up!
The Lilliputians mistook Hercules for an enemy from a mysterious floating island name Laput which shadows their lands from sun and rain. Then the hero promises to solve the mystery of the island in the sky and save his tiny new friends. But will the Lilliputian king believe a huge foreigner enough to untie him? Anyway Hercules’s going to fight for his freedom and justice!
Together with Hercules you will take a trip through little and big lands, build bizarre devices, fly to the clouds, defeat sky pirates, and face various unexpected situations. Join this fascinating dimensionless journey right now!

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Isle of Dread
description: The Isle of Dread expansion for Dungeons & Dragons Online, also known as Update 55. The expansion is built around a beloved classic D&D adventure and features an increased level cap, a new playable race, new character-building options, monsters, and more.

name: My Cozy Home
description: My Cozy Home is a relaxing house building game where you get to build the house you always dreamed of. The game offers a huge library of items to create a bedroom or a kitchen or a gaming room or anything you can dream of. Choice is yours.

name: Match, Talk, Date!: A Modern Dating Sim!
description: 'Match, Talk, Date!' is a dating sim where you use a dating app to chat to a diverse cast of characters. You decide what to say and how the conversation goes. Can you convince them to go out on a date with you, or are you going home alone?

name: Knockout Master
description: Knockout Master is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel that puts you in the role of a boxer, whose dream is to become the world's heavyweight champion. The game is packed with sex, romance, drama, and a rich story.

name: KoboldKroniken
description: The KoboldKroniken - a unique new world full of exciting adventures. Master the catacombs of Kwertz in the dunegon runner full of puzzles and dangers, collect valuable kokkatts, grow your own umpfs and create your personal goblin avatar.

name: Laura of Reigetsu
description: There was a girl named Laura who lived in a remote village called Hatayaki. She was close friends with a girl named Lunaroa who lived next door, and they promised to marry in Yuriscene, a country where women can marry each other.

name: An Evening of Wonders
description: An Evening of Wonders is a choice-driven adult romance visual novel. Your childhood friend invites you to his birthday party where a beautiful stranger catches your eye. Your choices will determine whether you stay strangers forever or leave the party holding her hand after a wild night together.

name: Summer Clover
description: Experience a summer like never before as you become a live-in housekeeper for three charming sisters (and your supportive supervisor).

name: Sex Campus Story 18+
description: Embark on an exciting adventure as the main character in "Sex Campus Story," a visually stunning adult visual novel. You play the role of an ordinary student from an ordinary family, living a mundane life.

name: Terror at Oakheart
description: The renowned slasher horror films of the 1980s and 1990s serve as a source of inspiration for Terror at Oakheart. The community of Oakheart has been terrorized by Teddy, a masked serial killer. As the body count rises, you discover there is more going on here than just a man in a mask killing helpless teenagers.

name: ModelMaker
description: ModelMaker gives you the freedom to create assembly models with the editor, without any restrictions or presets. You can design unique assembly models to show your imagination and creativity.

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 3
description: Get in the middle of an investigation! Solitaire solitaire puzzles and train your mind!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Ia Scatter City
description: Ia Scatter City is a level made with unreal engine and the "ia scatter" add-on where you can fly through a small part of a sci-fi city.

name: Constance
description: Constance is a 2D hand-drawn action adventure featuring a paintbrush-wielding artist, striving to escape from a colorful but decaying inner-world, created by her declining mental health.

name: Grid Runner
description: VR ONLY. Drive your flying car at 500 MPH, weaving through traffic and avoiding the police. Enjoy the atmospheres of rainy, future noir nights and sunny, cab-driving days as you cruise to an original synthwave soundtrack or your own custom playlist. It's time to fly.

name: Re:Night
description: Re:Night is a roguelike deck-building & turn-based strategy game. Lead your team, slay monsters, collect loot, and defeat bosses. Utilize elemental power and tactical wisdom to end the loop of nights and bring back the dawn!

name: Kazoe Meshi
description: Have you ever wondered how many grains of rice are in your bowl when you are eating white rice? This game is a very simple game in which all you have to do is count the rice grains in the bowl. You will never have to worry about how many grains of rice are in your bowl again.

name: Bankwave: Neon Networth
description: Inspired by cyberpunk and synthwave influences, Bankwave: Neon Networth is a narrative-based customer-service simulation with escape room elements. The game features dozens of quirky characters, multiple endings, and an immersive paperwork simulation.

name: Bronzebeard's Tavern
description: A multiplayer tavern management game.

name: Stormbane
description: A third person medieval multiplayer RPG where you create your own legend, the story is unwritten, your destination is unknown, 50 gold in your pocket, a sword, and the wild lands in front.

name: The Onkilons
description: A top-down action adventure combining a rich story of brave explorers with intense combats against mythical creatures and a hostile cave tribe (stealth is also a choice). Fight, solve puzzles to explore the island and meet the local mysterious inhabitants known as the Onkilons.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Vecna Unleashed
description:
The mini-expansion introduces a climax to The Codex of the Infinite Planes Saga, where players must face the sinister presence of Vecna and his cult in Morgrave University.

Vecna Unleashed offers new adventures in various locations, including Sharn, the Plane of Water, the Abyss, and the Astral Plane. Players will battle against new monsters such as humanoid rodent Wererats and abyssal demonic Vrocks, while also unlocking a new Epic Destiny called the Machrotechnic.

name: Saviour of the Wasteland
description: Saviour of the Wasteland is a very NSFW adult, interactive visual novel. Scavenge resources, build your settlement, meet lots of new people, discover secrets and have lots of sex while navigating the challenges of the wasteland.

name: Epic Cards Battle 3
description: The latest free-to-play online strategy TCG battle card game. Each card is exquisitely designed. A balanced and fair competitive arena for TCG and CCG enthusiasts. Shine in various modes such as Ladder (PvP), Campaign (PvE), Roguelike, Guild Wars, League, Friendly Match, and Custom Match.

name: Titanic Terror
description: A submarine touring the Titanic has gone missing. As part of the coast guard, you have been called in to locate and rescue the crew before their oxygen runs out.

name: Wish Upon a Llama
description: Embark on a delightful journey of breeding and raising adorable animals like llamas, bunnies, and capybaras while building meaningful relationships with the residents of Llama Town. What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!

name: Morganica
description: Morganica is a first–person adventure with horror and action elements. Young man, abducted from the World of the Living, is forced to survive in a gloomy otherworldly City, which is controlled by the Demons of Evil. He is surrounded by people like him, as well as zombies and monsters.

name: Inner Seasons
description: Inner Seasons is a first person platformer with speed slide gameplay. Dash, jump, crouch and dodge walls flying at you with precise timing to progress. Slide through the seasons of life playing as River and learn from your mentor, Farley.

name: Bingo: Pet Rescue
description: Experience the joy of bingo and pet rescue combined! With delightful gameplay, embark on missions to save adorable pets while enjoying your favorite bingo games.

name: Midnight Havoc
description: Midnight Havoc is a top-down pixel art game with a simple premise... kill!! Play as a recluse who has been cursed with the mark of the beast. Hunt your prey, consume their heart, and grow stronger. Will you be a terrifying predator lurking in the shadows or a bloodthirsty monster tearing apart all?

name: Cube Kingdoms
description: You are the Lord of a small village in a medieval fantasy world. Build your kingdom by expanding your economy, defending yourself, recruiting troops, making your people happy (or not), all while your neighbors are breathing down your neck.

name: Breaking Survivors
description: Brick-breaking gameplay meets Survivors-like mechanics. Use your balls to destroy bricks, level up and pick upgrades to hold your ground against waves of incoming bricks and try to high score in this roguelite brick breaking game.

name: Commander: Zombie Wars
description: Embark on a gripping turn-based tactical game in a zombie-infested world. Choose survivors or zombies. Gather resources, recruit allies, and strategize against the undead or join the undead. Shape custom maps, and decide the fate of the world. Join the fight now!

name: Sparky
description: Help the robotic dog named Sparky complete the mission!

name: Exotic Kosmos
description: Invite your friends to an exchange of punches where up to four players can compete in the same arena in search of the glory of being the great champion. Also face the adventure mode where there are numerous mysteries, in a virtual and exotic adventure to the sound of a beautiful soundtrack.

name: Sunset Survival Station
description: After receiving a cryptic message with coordinates, you arrive at Sunset station, humanity's first stronghold in the past. Only ruins remind you of its former glory, and hordes of mutants roam around trying to tear apart uninvited guests.

name: They Dug Too Deep
description: Turn-based Dwarven Roguelike. Can you deal with the swarms the dwarves unleashed since They Dug Too Deep?

name: Skade
description: Upon her fathers' death, a young Jotunn woman swears vengeance upon the gods and begins a journey towards Asgård.

name: Stack-Making Neighbors
description: Stack-Making Neighbors is a casual physics-based puzzle game. Remove blocks from a tower, and carefully stack them on top. Play alone, or with friends.

name: Provoron
description: It's an adventure game about black&white crows.

name: Galaxy Hordes
description: Galaxy Hordes is an Action-Roguelike where you fight off waves of aliens across various unique planets. As you level up choose skills and passives to create a different build every run. Survive until the time is up and return to your ship with recourses to unlock permanent upgrades.

name: ShantyTown
description: ShantyTown is a relaxing city-block builder where you place objects according to adjacency bonuses to create a colorful and atmospheric urban diorama.

name: Chained Horror Experiences
description: This is a point-and-click horror game set in modern Japan. You must carefully explore the stages where items are randomly placed and escape while you have life. It's up to you to solve all the mysteries and stop the chain of fear experiences...

name: The Knight's Path
description: This game is an invitation to challenge a hero to become what the princess has been waiting for. Solve several ancient puzzles based on the classic Peg Solitaire game to reach the princess in a remote castle. Will you be the champion?

name: Just in Crime
description: Just in Crime is a detective video game in which you play a detective dog and a wizard cat. With a twist; you are able to travel back in time and examine the crime scene a few seconds before it happened.

name: Foot Fashion Simulator
description: Be a foot fashion stylist!

name: Naughty College 18+
description: Welcome to the world of Naughty College 18+ - an immersive visual novel for adults. In this game, you will witness the unique story of a young university professor who unintentionally becomes not only a mentor but also the object of passionate love for three seductive students.

name: Project Vostok
description: "Project Vostok" is a non-linear horror visual novel about a group of airplane crash survivors finding a mysterious Soviet-era bunker in Altai mountains. Uncover a story full of drama, horrors and decide the fate of diverse cast of characters in this visual novel.

name: Trade Post Forest
description: Trade Post Forest is an open world exploration game about a successful trade post in the middle of the woods. Explore the trade post and the surrounding land to discover new landmarks and tools. Don't get lost.

name: Cross Seekers
description: Sin descripción

name: Refidenptio
description: A Boomer-Shooter with epileptic 1-bit pixel art. Immerse yourself in an enigmatic story destroying all enemies in front of you with a unique combat mechanic. Face depression head on, your enemies are just things created by your mind.

name: Pin Crasher
description: Pin Crasher is an exciting and unique casual game that combines the classic sport of bowling with the fast paced action of endless runners.

name: Broken Hearts Island
description: Broken Hearts Island, a visual novel in the fantasy genre, tells the story of the adventures of a young oceanologist on a mysterious island.

name: Bandit Knight
description: Step into the boots of a master thief in Bandit Knight! Outsmart enemies, steal legendary treasures, and navigate a vibrant 2.5D pixel world. Customize your tools, unlock upgrades, and rise to become the ultimate King of Thieves!

name: Sweet Girl Gurumelo
description: Amanita is feeling down lately. She lost her best friend and she can't do anything about it. Could you listen to her story, and maybe help her out?

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Egypt
description: Puzzles of Egypt!

name: Specter
description: A Simplistic Ghost Hunting Game.

name: 07th Theater
description: 07th Theater is a crossover between Higurashi, Umineko, Higanbana, and Rose Guns Days.

name: Cerulean Days
description: On a seemingly idyllic island, the Internet is shut down. What will become of those unable to adapt? In 2018, a lethal biological attack claims a significant number of lives. While tragedy occupies people's minds to the brim, a controlling governmental plan is put into effect.

name: 10Minutes
description: This game is a single player FPS where you have 10 minutes to fight zombies in different locations, test your zombie survival skills and compete for high scores.

name: Tribe Quest
description: Embark on a perilous Quest! Load up your wagon with resources, craft tools & weapons, face dangerous enemies and survive! Explore diverse landscapes, uncover ancient secrets. Triumph against all odds in this unforgettable journey!

name: Buried Alive: Breathless Rescue
description: Are you ready to embark on a spine-chilling adventure? Step into the shoes of the protagonist and experience the terror of being "Buried Alive" in a crypt. Your mission is clear: Escape the confines of your coffin, find the key to unlock the door, and unveil the dark secrets that lie within.

name: Martial Arts Peerless War
description: This is a horizontal version of the machine street clearance/combat gameplay, featuring multi character AI development, editing combos, and action strategy games for battles in large scenes.

name: Nusantara Adventures
description: Grow in virtue or infamy amongst others as you fight your way to become an infamous guild in a roguelike procedurally generated unique world of Nusantara.

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 8
description: Episode 8 contains 5 new positions for your excitement.

name: Path of Ascension
description: Introducing Path of Ascension. The latest game from Undermax Games. Combining elements of classic RPG's with some Rouguelike content and the freedom to choose your own path, we have developed this simple but innovative project.

name: The Symbiant Re:Union
description: Take a deep dive into Danya’s and Brahve’s heat and romance in The Symbiant Re:Union. The events take place after two Endings of The Symbiant’s main game.

name: Exorcist Simulator
description: Exorcist Simulator is an immersive multiplayer horror game that will captivate players and immerse them in a world of supernatural events and dangers.

name: World Guesser
description: World Guesser is a multiplayer party royale game where you and your fellow contestants compete to deliver packet to successive target countries for the sake of being the last one to remain. It's a battle royale concept geography game that sends you on a plane trip around the earth.

name: Crossroad OS
description: Crossʀoad OS is a single-player adventure where you solve puzzles, meet strange creatures and explore a sacred operating system created as a junction between the human and spirit world.

name: The Mice Plight
description: Escape a treacherous labyrinthine prison by outsmarting guards in tactical card-based battles. Pick your abilities before each encounter, tailoring your strategy. Defeat guards to steal their skills, navigate deadly traps, and unleash your cunning to secure your freedom.

name: Baro Kart
description: Help Baro and his friends to save the universe from the evil witch doctor, race is the main challenge, and you are the savior.

name: Joyride: Lowpoly World
description: Joyride is a low-polygon style racing game. Different seasons have different scenery, and different locations have different driving pleasures. You can race, off-road, hang out, and even operate drones here. You can also discover hidden levels in the game to get a completely different experience.

name: Jarpug
description: Jarpug is a JRPG about a pug with a jar on her head. Help Pug and her friends explore a 3D platformer world and fight in turn-based RPG battles. Designed for VR and flat screens, either way is a great way to play! Explore the magical, fantastic world of the modern dog.

name: Claw Machine Sim
description: Physically accurate claw machine simulator!

name: My Unusual Feline Friend
description: From another dimension, a strange and very cute catgirl visits you. She is very curious how sex works in this dimension and she has chosen you to teach her all about it!

name: Pogo3D
description: Tough-as-nails 3D platforming using only your mouse! Bounce off platforms and even the walls to reach the next checkpoint. Go on a linear adventure through an interconnected world, or quickly test your skills in challenge mode.

name: Sylvana's Chronicles
description: A turn-based strategy game with roguelike and deck-building elements. Explore a dark and magical world full of forgotten lands, monsters, and secrets. Build your own deck of cards to fight your way through the dungeons. Upgrade your cards, unlock new items, and discover ancient artifacts.

name: Da Paper Boy
description: Get locked and loaded as 3 Teens run through the town delivering mail in a whole new modern way! As you generate points on the leaderboard while dodging OG granny and the neighborhood watch. Only one question remains... Are you the best paper boy or paper girl? Let your score tell it all!

name: Gorgon Shield
description: Gather your party of expendable heroes. Climb a vast tower atop a shiny shield. Who will fight? Who will heal? Who will laze around and take all the treasure. The choices will be yours alone, but only those who work together will reach the top of the Tower Shield.

name: Mortarmen
description: Mortarmen is a strategic multiplayer PvP first and third person shooter, pitting the New American Coalition versus United Communist Front in a battle for control of Arakousa, a Mediterranean paradise, where soldiers traverse via sliding, rolling, climbing, and HALO drops.

name: Lunia Z:Revival
description: Lunia Z is an "Action Arcade" MMORPG. This translates to being a more action-oriented game, where you directly control your character and its actions, combining attacks you can create using the keyboard keys. It feels like watching an animated film with a powerful 3D impact and presentation.

name: LightSup!
description: LightSup! is a couch-action co-op game for 1-4 players with rogue-lite elements where you play as adventurers encounter ferocious monsters crawling from the Eclipse Dungeons. Prepare your weapons and protect the Altar of Light at any cost, or the world will be doomed into darkness forever.

name: Across Kiloparsecs
description: A science-fiction novel where you investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death of a close friend.

name: Skinny Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Sweety Sweets
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Lovely Brides
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Cool Lady
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Nova Strike
description: Fire up your blaster cannons and take on waves of enemies in this retro shoot'em up with procedural levels. Come back stronger with each attempt and beat the high score!

name: Playroom Racer 2
description: Small cars, big fun! Playroom Racer 2 is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

name: Tweaked Revolution
description: Tweaked Revolution is a true street racing game with unmatched levels of car customization in the AppStore.

name: Bizzy Robo
description:
If you are looking for a game that will really push your limits, make you think beyond the line and enjoy the numerous challenges that only logic and sharp mind solves, Bizzy Robo is the ideal game for you!

Stunning graphics in space environment, 10 different stations and 100 levels to repair, cute little Robos that need your help in pushing the objects into right places limited by moves, only clever decisions and the most persistent players can succeed.
The race to the top has began, lets see who can make it till the end!

name: School Bus Driving Simulator
description: Experience a realistic school bus with the exciting School Bus Driving Simulator! Get students safely to school, earn rewards, and customize your bus.

name: Rebirth Moment
description: At the end of the world where alien bugs and zombie thugs run rampant, you are a special "bug slayer" who was sent to an unknown town to perform a final mission. As one of the executors of the "Rebirth Plan", you must find the "Reborners", protect them, and survive as long as possible...

name: Space Tales
description: Space Tales is a real-time strategy game set in a retro-futuristic environment. Take on the role of a commander in the Intergalactic Planetary Expansion (I.P.E.) and immerse yourself in a thrilling mission to explore and conquer new planets, pushing the boundaries of the Human Empire.

name: Doom Sweeper
description: Doom Sweeper is a 2D pixel-style game. Clean up the approaching zombie climax, and exchange it for cash, embarking on a journey to become an arms dealer in the apocalypse. Complete the game, unlock more items in the shop, and achieve various achievements to obtain different CG!

name: Office Is My Harem
description: After being unreasonably criticised by your manager, you decided to fight back. Unexpectedly, this attracted your female colleagues. Could it be that a chance to fulfill your fantasy of having a workplace harem? This visual novel game has a readily story rhythm and lots of erotic scenes.

name: Hot Worlds
description: Fight. Learn. Team up. Win. Fighting her way through inter-dimensional arenas and escapades, Val the all-star fighter must defeat baddies and amass her crew along her way to win fame in not just one, but every world.

name: Heavy Sword
description: Heavy Sword is an action adventure Platformer with some RPG elements. Imagine if you took some of the best parts of Zelda II NES, Super Mario World SNES and fused them into something new! Take Control of Pike in his quest to rid the land of horrendous monsters!

name: Gothel
description: An online Sci-Fi Action RPG set deep in a futuristic military complex, built to generate an endless steam of AI-powered killing machines. Fight your way out from its deep depths, solo or with friends, to discover why you alone have the freedom of choice, and ultimately, stop whoever runs the place.

name: Truth
description: Step into the role of judge on a new reality show and award the one million dollar prize to the contestant you feel most deserves it. There are six contestants hooked up to lie detectors who must answer any question you ask them. Vote one off each round until only the winner remains.

name: Escape From Exile
description: Escape From Exile is a Story Driven Survival game you can enjoy with your friends. By following the immersive story and fighting the mobs you find along it. Build bases, farm food and survive the night and maybe you will Escape from Excile!

name: Oberty
description: Oberty is minimal shape-blending puzzle game where you XOR-blending simple geometric shapes to make a beautiful complex target shape.

name: Bleak Winter
description: The world is against you in this brutal third-person survival experience, and your only goal is survival at any cost. Loot, build, scavenge and craft your way to survive against the world and everything within.

name: RunNCrush
description: RunNCrush is a party platformer game where you play your friends in various mini games. Try your hand at soccer, racing, and more, while crushing your pals!

name: Art of Golf
description: Physics based 2D golf game. Play tournaments, beat challenges or compete for high scores. Many game modes, extra sports and mini-games.

name: Bare Knuckle Sandwich
description: Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D fighting game with side-scrolling exploration and a character-driven narrative. BKS tells the story of a young, directionless guy, Gunner, who joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring.

name: Pavephobia
description: Pavephobia is an action game where you decide how the level builds up. You choose whether you want to encounter a trap or an enemy next. It's up to you. You want to know more? Then go to Pavephobia!

name: Lazy Jiangshi
description: A visual novel about lazy jiangshi Mao and her even lazier mistress.

name: Re/terra
description: Journey across a post-apocalpytic world as you race to find the key to the future before the food runs out

name: All Chess
description: Create, collect and play board games from around the world, you can customise board sizes, piece moves and their unique look. There's 1 board game I've created, 20+ classic board games and countless future games of yours!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Empires & Ashes
description: The empires of mortals resurge after the devastation brought forth by the Wizard Kings. In Empires and Ashes, players fuse Magic and Steel to unleash devastating war machines to drive the Godir back into the Astral Sea. Includes a new Culture, Tomes, Empire Building options and Story Realm.

name: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator
description: Prison Survival: Architect of Crime Simulator is a sequel to the warmly received Prison Simulator, but with an unusual twist - you're no longer a prison guard. You are the prisoner! Steal, sell drugs make deals with the guards, - whatever suits you, prepare for hardships you have never seen before!

name: Halcyon: The WaveBorn
description: Halcyon is a Roguelite with Deck-Building mechanics that uses an isometric camera. In the game you will use a deck of cards to move the character and another deck of cards to perform attacks and defenses, while trying to survive level after level.

name: 60 Clicks: Read, Select, Connected Worlds
description: This is a Short Visual Novel, that ends the story by your 60 clicks, and in full Live2D animation. Choose the options that appear again and again, to interact with the heroine. Repeat the story, understanding the mysteries, and fall in love with her.

name: Crowned
description: Crowned is a fast-paced tactical role-playing game with a focus on environmental interactions and distinct unit skills over big numbers. Follow the bold warrior Balta as he gathers an eclectic bunch of allies to defeat all that stand in his way to claim the Crown of Lazur.

name: Haiyuuenchi no Memento Memoria
description: An abandoned amusement park in a broken world. It was a paradise called "Lagoon" where children were self-sufficient. A boy working as a mercenary in "Lagoon" happened to meet a silver-haired girl. The wheels of their destiny begin to move.

name: Parfum Nostalgique
description: Parfum Nostalgique is a heartfelt tale about the people who change us, for better and for worse. From betrayal to unconditional love, from regret to hope… see the drama unfold between exes and lovers, old friends and new, when you dive into this kinetic visual novel dram-com series. With delicate vintage shoujo-inspired art, original soundtrack, and a diverse cast of voice actors, Parfum Nostalgique is a lovingly handmade passion project packaged with sweets and scented with roses by sole developer Prince Rosalium for your reading pleasure.

name: WCP Word Girlfriend
description: A game that combines visual novel elements with gameplay for vocabulary memorization. With this game, we offer an exciting adventure that transforms word learning into an enjoyable and rewarding experience. Join us now to explore the joy of English learning in this visually immersive game!

name: Five Nations: Renegades
description: Renegades is the first official expansion pack of Five Nations, an old-school sci-fi real-time strategy game. It features a new campaign, new playable factions, units, stations, weapons, and skirmish maps.

name: Mujina
description: Mujina is a Maze Exploration game where the player has to activate 4 objective points and reach the end portal. Beware of the monsters and the numerous traps awaiting you! If everyone dies, it will result in a failure! Group up with your friends or anyone online to complete the 3 type of mazes!

name: Hex Racer
description: Race through the asteroid belt, hit checkpoints to increase your score, Use power ups to help you. Game Modes - Monthly event with leaderboard - Endless/practice - Split Screen - Story mode

name: Daybreakers
description: On that day, you finished your work and returned to your apartment as usual, but unexpectedly, you involved in a large-scale conspiracy. Horrifying explosions, mysterious virus, and encounters with unfamiliar beautiful girls one after another...

name: Search and Rescue: Yosemite
description: Search and Rescue: YosemiteThis DLC will include huge map of major Yosemite Park trails.Five times bigger map than Tatra National Park!

name: Dickland: Racing
description: Dickland: Racing is a two-player arcade action racing game! The main feature among such races is the amazing pipe world and the physicality of the game characters!

name: Hunter Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Cuties
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Girls in Pajamas
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - The Walking Dead Bundle
description: Embody the spirit of resourceful leader Rick Grimes or grab one of the most iconic weapons out there. Oh, and don't forget, even though it's pretty obvious, “If it's dead, then kill it!”.

name: Lightspeed Bit Bit
description:
Lightspeed Bit Bit is a unique retro neon stylized arcade game. The simple one finger control makes it easy for anybody to pick up and play, but it's also challenging without being frustrating. This game has three awesome game modes.
◊Bit Bit Mode: This is the main mode of the game. There are three difficulties-Easy, Medium, and Insane. Your ship loses a little bit of health every second and also when you collect the wrong color bit. You must collect bits that match the color of your ship to add to your health and score.

name: Hondune's Truck Trials
description: Hondune's Truck Trials is a game that sets itself apart from other driving games. This time it's not all about speed, but rather pure skill, concentration, and a little luck. The goal is to get as many of the 4 crates you start with to the finish 'zone'. Each crate counts as a 1000 point bonus to an otherwise falling score. Each time you pass a level you unlock the next level, and possibly a new vehicle! Compete locally and globally to gain the highest score on each of the 40 levels! Then take your unlocked vehicles and hone your skills in the free ride arena!

name: Vs. Racing
description: Experience the thrill and excitement of full-on arcade racing.

name: Desert Force: Rescue Mission
description:
Special mission to the special force to handle a war in the land of middle east. You are a special man in this force who are given difficult task to handle the war in the middle east.

You must use good tactics and your skills to fight the enemy. And you must be careful from the terrorist.

Complete the deadly missions in the land of middle east, to fight the terrorist.
There are 15 stages of different difficulty levels, play and feel the tense atmosphere when you fight the enemy forces.

name: Space Cantina
description:
Match, squeeze, mix, serve! Great music, incredible visuals, cute planets. Explore space, open your restaurant and become the best bartender!
Become the best bartender throughout in the music themed universe. Dozens of ingredients to mix, hundreds of customers to serve is waiting for you behind the doors! Explore the vast space and discover new planets as you go. More than 20 space ships are waiting for you to begin your journey. Play with your friends through facebook or compete with them through leaderboards.
More than 70 levels to play with bonus levels waiting for you upon completing each planet, and more levels on the way! Earn high scores and rewards.

name: Muster my Monsters
description:
Have a blast fighting in the arena of this hilarious 4-player party game for the entire family. To deal with this bunch of monsters, the key is to have rapid reflexes, good intuition and master the art of bluffing. And don't forget mocking at your rivals whenever you win!

Muster my Monsters mechanics are based on a rock-paper-scissors gameplay design and are really simple. Each player controls a monster and every monster is able to perform 3 different actions: Attack, Mock and Dodge. Attack beats Mock, Mock beats Dodge and Dodge beats Attack. The player who manages to KO all the rivals wins the combat!

name: Tunguska: Shadow Master
description: Enjoy enhanced stealth gameplay in Tunguska with new melee and steath weapons and a new game mode: Sticks-And-Stones.

name: Scribble Worm
description:
Draw worms with your fingers and watch them come to life in this new puzzle game! Avoid the red walls, bounce off the blue walls, slide on the gray walls. Watch out: some walls move! Pattern anticipation and timing are a must in this challenging and addictive puzzle game.
Challenge your friends in the 2-player head-to-head mode. Race your worms to reach the apple first, and collect the GameCenter achievements.

name: FastBall 2 F.
description:
Over 6 million players are enjoying FastBall 2, now it's your turn to taste it...
FastBall is back and is faster, fun and addictive than ever...
In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen.
With this simple mechanic, FastBall 2 contains 155 action packed levels spawned across 5 level packs. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end.
It is easy to play and easy to enjoy....

name: Lion Bubble Tosser: The Queen of the Safari
description:
This is classic bubble shooter game. Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Zimba is love to play with her bubbles. Help her to reach her goals.

name: Tap City
description:
Get ready to be part of the city revolution with Tap City!
Prove your building skills with the stunning tap adventure through the most emblematic cities in the world. Start from a scratch with a quiet residential neighbourhood, and reach the summit building the most impressive skyline that humankind has ever seen. Progressing in our hard world has evolved to an amusing journey. Don't worry about aggressive rival strategies and focus on delighting yourself with the awesomeness of your streets.

And remember, cities are not only about buildings! Cities are also about life, movement and the happiness of their citizens. Discover new vehicles, furnish the streets and clean the air with plants and trees. Every small effort counts when building a legendary capital. While your city improves, new challenges will arise. Rise your civilization to the top by improving your technologies.

In Tap City you will be able to upgrade your city with 100+ building evolutions, 20+ vehicles to discover and tens of unique city decorations. All these through 50+ world cities from all around the globe with 16 technology upgrades.

name: Internet Addicted Youth 2005
description: Netjunker 2005 is a story-oriented role-playing game that incorporates a variety of scenario-appropriate gameplay. You will play the role of Wang Xiaoleng, and face the criticism of Internet addiction and games from teachers, classmates and parents in the early 20th century.

name: Ski Jumping PVP
description: Experience the thrill of being a ski jumping champion! Step into the shoes of a professional jumper and engage in exciting competitions against players from across the globe. Take on authentic ski jumps inspired by real-world locations.

name: Memory Wonderland: Bond
description: This game is a maze exploration RPG that combines features such as strategic combat, puzzle-solving adventure, collectibles, and emotional storylines to provide an engaging gaming experience with beautiful scenery.

name: Joy Life
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: RTS Football
description: RTS Football is a game with all the classic mechanics of a 2D Real Time Strategy game but with added (American) Football elements. Battle and blow up the opposing robots in pursuit of scoring touchdowns, or preventing them.

name: Football Streaker Simulator
description: We all thought about it, and now you can give it a try. Run onto the football field, take a selfie with your favorite player, escape from a huge crowd of stewards, and disrupt the game for the entire stadium. What could be better?

name: Sex City: 2069
description: Sex City: 2069 is a third-person cyberpunk shooter, you'll embody a captivating female protagonist amidst an atmosphere of cyberpunk and science fiction. Prepare yourself for adult-oriented content as you dive into the depths of this virtual city.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 3
description: Puzzles of landscapes!

name: First Jam
description: The guardians of the fruit family - the banana warriors - stepped forward and picked up your favorite weapons, tried every way to become stronger, and fought against the evil food processing factory. Destroy their lair and make those who hurt their compatriots pay bloody price.

name: Land of Borealia
description: Jump, leap, glide, and build as you take on the threat of the Dark Dragon in this innovative combo of 3D puzzle platformer and tower defense. Traverse the mythical Land of Borealia, complete puzzles, and play minigames to grow your arsenal against the Dragon’s minions!

name: Battle for the Board
description: Adventure through a colorful tabletop-themed world, strategically rolling special moves and attacks to defeat enemy pieces in this turn-based action strategy game!

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season Final Part 2
description: "Noel the Mortal Fate" is now complete! The time of the decisive battle has finally arrived. Noel and Caron finally confront Burrows, they raise their fists in a final counterattack in the face of the onslaught. What does the girl see at the end of her revenge.

name: PPP
description: PPP is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you solve your way out. There are 20 different enjoyable levels where each of them offers unique experience.

name: Hop n Pee Dreams VR
description: Hop n Pee Dreams VR is a spirited platformer bursting with innovative VR mechanics. Embark on a short dream through cylindrical platforms as you hoard beers, dodge barrels, and search for relief amidst rock, funk and the sublime Clair de Lune! Strap in for a pee-rific adventure!

name: Jump King Quest
description: Brave The Heights together or alone in this unhinged Multiplayer-Combat-RPG successor to the Original Tactical Leaping Adventure from Nexile.

name: Sangoku Ziangqi
description: A strategy board game set in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. Combine various soldiers with generals and command your troops to aim for victory!

name: Skyguard 0: Air Arcade
description: Skyguard is a single player arcade flight combat game with stylized graphics and fast-paced gameplay. Switch between different squadrons, shred enemy in dogfight, engage groups of enemy with multi-lock weapons.

name: Stand Your Ground
description: Stand Your Ground is an immersive tactical FPS game where you must defend yourself from armed attackers. Play as an American Civilian, who is well within their right to legally own and use a firearm, and fight your way out of situations inspired by actual events - or let the attackers take over.

name: Politon
description: Politon is an easy to learn turn-based strategy game where you challenge the minds of your opponents with your cunning and wits.

name: Project Apparition
description: Project Apparition is a 4 player cooperative paranormal investigation game currently in development. The aim of the game is to take on missions to investigate and remove ghosts from haunted buildings.

name: Stickfigurez
description: Stickfigurez is an indie platform fighter featuring iconic characters from classic stick figure animations. Play with up to 4 players locally or online!

name: Kingdom Square
description: A tile-based minimalist city-building and automation game set in the middle ages.

name: Recycle Bin Battle
description: Reycle Bin Battle is an arcade puzzle game based on 3 differents gameplay. Make combo with rubishes to make ball, use ball in a breakout to get energy and finally use energy to shoot Kaiju coming from outer space.

name: Creeper World IXE
description: The Creeper always returns... but this time, we have the advantage! Explore new worlds where the creeper, sand, and particles all merge in a pixel level simulation pushing the bounds of real time strategy into new territory.

name: Hero of Luxuria
description: Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Hero of Luxuria. Save the world from the danger hanging over it.

name: The Last Train
description: In a desolate wasteland on the brink of extinction, the last train sets off towards the surface, rumored to carry passengers in search of a place to survive. A creature named Eilf boards the train, determined to reach the vanished final destination—Spring.

name: Blamed
description: Blamed is an adult detective game in the visual novel genre. Walk the path of Detective David Fox and unravel a series of mysterious murders happening in the city. Make choices and influence the course of the investigation, conquer girls, and catch criminals.

name: EcoGnomix
description: A quirky mix of roguelite and city builder. Build a lively little city above, by looting mystical caves with a team of gnomes below! Use multiple runs to unlock upgrades and abilities to help your gnomes venture deeper into the dangerous underground.

name: Tensei Brave
description: Due to the invasion of the Demon Lord, countries around the world have been destroyed. In the last remaining country, a hero is summoned. Players control the hero, gather allies, and set out on a journey to defeat the Demon Lord. Can the seemingly weak protagonist indeed vanquish the Demon Lord?

name: Wizard's Owl: Magic Delivery
description: Wizard's Owl invites you into a captivating world of wizards, owls, and a quest to save the magical realm. In this adventure, you take on the role of a determined owl working for a prestigious mail and parcel delivery service. Your aspiration is to become a personal owl for the main wizard.

name: Xero
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled world of Xero, a high-octane platform game that thrusts you into the cockpit of a futuristic fighting robot! Strap on your jetpack, power up your lasers, and unsheathe your razor-sharp swords as you prepare for the ultimate battle.

name: Packet.Breach()
description: Packet.Breach() is a strategy roguelike where you place hacker program towers to manipulate, duplicate, and teleport enemy projectiles to destroy security programs. Add towers to your deck as you progress and develop your own strategy—and uncover the truths behind the mega corporation's agendas.

name: Succubus's Making Lunch
description: Everyone loves to eat, and succubus is no exception! Our succubus loves to eat and has an inhuman appetite! Help her cook before she eats you!

name: Engaging Destiny
description: A fantasy platformer where you can explore the town of Faranel and its surrounding areas. Meet the townsfolk, interact with them in various ways and maybe even have some special fun with them while you're at it!

name: Sleepy Time Jack: Digital Talking Body Pillow
description: Fall asleep to the soothing sound of your Sunny Day Jack's voice as he praises and comforts you in this Digital Talking Body Pillow app!

name: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled
description: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled is a unique Visual Novel experience with a complex story hiding behind a simple facade. Make a pact with a Succubus, through which a whole bunch of beautiful, sexy ladies will show up at your door! Can you satisfy them all?

name: Furry Futanari Jigsaw 2
description: Be a good girl or boy and have fun with this sexy futanari puzzle game.

name: Mercenaries Saga 2: Order of the Sliver Eagle
description: “Mercenaries Saga 2: Order of the Silver Eagle” is a tactical simulation RPG where you fight through 32 stages with Claude, Captain of the Silver Eagles and his team.

name: Mercenaries Saga 3: Gray Wolves of War
description: “Mercenaries Saga 3: Gray Wolves of War” is a tactical simulation RPG set in a fantasy background. It is the third game of the Mercenaries Saga.

name: Out of the Mist
description: Challenge yourself to master a unique control scheme in this platformer game. Take control of the environment and traverse through atmospheric, yet challenging levels.

name: Behind the Horizon: The Sky Fortress
description: Expands the game Behind the Horizon with a new exciting main story, many new areas, items, spells, new pets and plants ! - A farm RPG in a nature simulation that keeps changing the world. Dive into a new adventure! BtH-The Sky Fortress awaits you...

name: Plastomorphosis
description: Evacuated from his hometown due to the dangerous bursts of dark energy, the ordinary citizen is trying to overcome and survive a series of events in a new reality, where living as a human being is not possible anymore. 3rd-person horror with fixed camera angles and retro-styled graphics.

name: Bloc-Age: Path of the Oracle
description: A story driven fast paced action FPS with a retro twist.

name: Black Silk Girl
description: This is a casual masturbation girl game. You're flying a plane in space looking down on Earth when a bunch of alien spaceships fire at you. You have to survive. As a reward, survive to the end, and you will see the Black Silk Girl. Head out into space!

name: Beauty Crush
description: game challenges players' powers of observation, reaction speed, and strategic thinking. Whether enjoyed in short bursts or as a long gaming session, this game offers enjoyment and challenges that entice players to return and push their limits time and again.

name: Cooking Simulator 2: Better Together
description: Cooking Simulator is back – bigger, better, and with optional multiplayer! Create your own recipes and take advantage of new and improved controls to become the best restaurant cook in the city! Or just have fun and enjoy cooking at your own pace. You’re the chef here!

name: Top Jump
description: Climb fast, reach the top! In Top Jump, race through a perilous cave to dominate the leaderboard. Time can be rewound in training, but in ranked mode, use it wisely to avoid losing precious seconds. Precision, speed, and strategy are key in this addictive vertical challenge!

name: Osmos+
description:
Enter the Darwinian world of a galactic mote. Grow by absorbing smaller motes—but beware of being absorbed yourself.
Osmos+ features unique physics-based play, stellar graphics, and a hypnotic ambient soundtrack.
Navigate through floating playgrounds, competitive petri dishes, deep solar systems, and more.
The key is to balance mass and movement: to propel yourself you must eject matter behind you, causing you to shrink. Use it wisely.
Whether you're a child at heart who likes mucking about with single-cell organisms, or a strategist with a physics degree, this game is for you.

name: Golf Putt 3D
description: Golf Putt brings the ultimate golf experience to your device. 3D environment & beautiful greenish outfield gives your spine a chill and the sporty thrill. Time the ball perfectly to make it to the hole. Different slopes makes the game a challenge to play.

name: Turtle Run: Crood Islands of Oz
description: Adventure with the fastest Turtle in Oz! Race him across the islands to reach the tower in this fun filled runner. Beware of nasty wizards and goblins! Will you make it out of Oz?

name: Bird Tale
description:
Our young birds, recently born, are preparing their first challenge in life, to learn how to fly! This is where you'll need to help them.
With one touch easy mechanic, touch the screen to make them flap their wings. Not so easy though, the forest they are is filled with obstacles including trees, spikes and forest folks such as Bee.
Through your way, you'll collect fruits and our birds love them! Better, you can use them to unlock new baby birds, themes and features through the store!

name: One Button Games 5-in-1
description:
Challenge yourself with these 5 one-button fast-paced games.

In "B Cannon" you are moving around the screen and can reverse your direction by pressing a button. Your goal is to shoot the circles that are bouncing around. You aim automatically and shoot at the current aim position. Hold a button to shoot. The circles break up into smaller ones and you have to shoot them until they can no longer be broken down. The game is over when you touch any circle.

In "Cate P" you score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar. The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

In "S Lanes" You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points. The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

In "Thunder" you are running in the middle of a thunderstorm. Collect the stars that form when lightning strikes the ground to score points. But avoid getting hit by lightning. Reverse your direction by pressing a button or by hitting the sides of the screen. The game is over when you get struck.

In "UD Cave" your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points. The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: Murder Mystery Bundle
description: Murder! A fabulously wealthy game designer is found dead outside a castle in rural Vermont, and soon evidence shows that this was not merely a freak accident attributed to local superstition. Now it's up to you to investigate and apprehend the guilty. Play as unlikely partners -- ace sleuth Detective Guy and Cleo the clue-sniffing dog to explore the castle grounds, search for clues, and question suspects. Can you solve the case?

name: Blasphemous II: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover.
Includes a Digital Soundtrack and a Digital Artbook.

name: Boss Rush Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Onslaught
description: A 2D hack and slash where you rapidly switch between three characters to decimate waves of enemies! Fight your way through dangerous areas, each with unique monsters and bosses.

name: Rebel!
description: Imagine yourself living under your favourite oppressive regime. Rebel! Fight waves of SWAT teams. Loot their weapons and money. Buy upgrades. Enlist allies. See your uprising crushed. Repeat. Casual top down/ dual stick shooter with short, intense gameplay and a clever AI.

name: Life's Too Short!
description: Life's Too Short! A 1-minute life simulator: Birth, Life, Death, in 60 seconds! Roll, toddle, bounce, climb and clamber through a colourful, hand-made world. Be anyone, do anything, but remember: time flies when you're having fun...

name: Hotel Simulator
description: Hotel Simulaton is your chance to build and run a hotel empire. Design your hotel, manage staff, satisfy diverse guests, and set winning strategies. This simulation game blends creativity, strategy, and management in an immersive hotelier journey.

name: Slam Dunk Basketball 2
description:
Sale continues! Celebrating 70 top ten rankings worldwide for iPhone and iPad, Slam Dunk Basketball continues to do more and get better.
Hustle for cash, level up, play in tournaments and become the Basketball Champion! Play with people from all over the world and become the world’s best basketball player!

name: Strangers on Paper
description: What better place to find a muse than among strangers in a bar? In a quest for inspiration, your choices will dictate how you navigate reconnecting with people from your past and helping each other towards a better present and future.

name: Omen
description: Embark on a journey in "One Man's Eternal Night," a 3D adventure game. As Prince Omen, betrayed and cursed into a vampire, traverse a haunting world, solve puzzles, and combat monsters. Will you reclaim your lost throne or succumb to the eternal night?

name: Portal: Bagley
description: Portal: Bagley is a fan-made, free modification for Portal 2 which plays in an unknown time period. Portal: Bagley tells a new story using new characters including the test subject, you!

name: Sassy Girl
description: Working in a gossip magazine. Being surrounded by beautiful women, and having incredible erotic adventures!

name: Soulslinger: Envoy of Death
description: You are a gunslinger in limbo, involved in a gritty war against "The Cartel", a ruthless organization harvesting souls to break free of the shackles of the afterlife. Grow stronger with each new run, gather the essence of lost souls to take on the biggest threats in this rogue-lite FPS!

name: Curfew
description: Curfew is a first-person stealth horror game set in a surreal town gripped by a mysterious plague and crushed under the boot of a totalitarian regime. Uncover an ancient conspiracy that threatens the very survival of the population.

name: Wacky Wonderland Wollop: A 3D Platformer for the Ages Game of the Year All Time: The Game
description: A 3D Platformer 3PShooter Dialogue Driven Soulslike with RPG elements and free Unity assets. What it doesn't have in Art Direction, it makes up in charm, mechanics, features, and very funny smart political commentary that says alot about are society.

name: The Castle
description: Do you enjoy listening to stories and having the ability to influence their unfolding? If so, then immerse yourself in the role of an active participant as you join Yaren on her quest for freedom.

name: Ring Racer
description: Navigate through rings in stunning canyons and race against the clock.

name: Heroic Tale Value!+
description: Calling all the heroes! Take control of a party of adventurers and embark in this dungeon crawling journey through three different scenarios!

name: Waifu Club: Ayame
description: Waifu Club is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy Ayame in 6 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: Save the World
description: The story is a young man summoned to another world is suffered from the scourge of aggression by monsters, and save the world with the native heroes. Game mode is rogue, you only release your kill desire to kill the monsters all! Special Zhen Fa System, allow you active powerful Zhen Fa to bombing!

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
description: iOS and Symbian game based on the movie Transformers: Dark of the Moon.

name: Neon Runner
description: Test yourself on the neon lit tracks of Neon Runner. A fast paced runner style game that requires speed and precision to complete all levels as quickly as possible and set a high score.

name: Tower Builder
description: Tower Builder is online Co-op or single player building and design game.

name: Sky Escort
description: Sky Escort is a rouge-like card game featuring TD and management. Players roleplay an airborne mercenary,escorting clients' cargo to earn rewards. Buildcard decks, recruit crew members, and customize arms to enrich gameplay. Multiple factions can be chose from, each with unique combat style.

name: Black Box LSS: The Merciful Savior
description: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends love, crime, and romantic comedy. A story of a young man forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love. If you're a fan of love story, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

name: Haven's Compass
description: Haven's Compass is a Fast Paced but Tactical FPS with Hero Shooter elements that you can interchange!

name: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! Love for These Clothes of Desire!
description: It's time for a Visual Novel Quest with a twist! Join Kazuma, a reincarnated adventurer, and spend turbulent days with his unfortunate party members. Prepare for waifus, dress-up and resource management and get ready for an Isekai comedy that’s out of this world!

name: Invaders
description: Defend humanity against alien invasion, in a roguelike world where you will have to make decisions and try to form the best deck in order to handle the difficulties. Try to get the highest score in each level, develop your skills, your deck and beat the different champions.

name: Smash Runner
description: Smash, Run, Jump & Shoot!

name: Kingdoms
description: Fight for your Kingdom! Collect unique pieces, form a powerful army, and defeat opponents in action-packed turn-based battles. Utilize strategy and tactics to outsmart your enemies and capture their Commander, before they capture yours.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
description: Mobile phones and Blackberry OS port of Transformers: Dark of the Moon.

name: Pusher: Drug Tycoon
description: Thrilling business tycoon sim where you step into the shoes of a drug dealer in 1980s USA. Your main goal is simple: Buy low and sell high. Get ready for an experience where you'll combine strategy, risk-taking, and decision-making to build your criminal empire.

name: Bl00d.exe
description: The year is 2099 and Daydream, New Jersey is under corporate rule. Corporate Killers determine the fate of who lives and who dies. Become Sam Boone, Harmoney's star Corporate Killer, and go on a path of vengeance and violence in this retro inspired, cyberpunk boomer shooter.

name: Doubumon
description: Doubumon is an RPG monster collecting/battling game. Experience tactical battles as you choose 4 Doubumon to fight with on the battlefield. Grow, evolve, and customize your attacks while developing different strategies in order to win, as you fight and explore your way to become the Doubumon champion.

name: Taboo Trial
description: In the "Forbidden Trial", a Roguelike role-playing action game, you will play a girl Einherjar in the Spirit Hall of Norse mythology, and find the truth of the gods at dusk through fighting and exploration.

name: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
description: A neighboring country has declared war! The first war in a long time. Due to a shortage of personnel, Estelle, the princess, has taken command of the army. Eh?! "Whoever performs well, can marry the princess as a reward." How can this be!?

name: Eonia Revelations
description: Take on the role of Blin Albius, the last Knowledge Seeker apprentice, and sort through the most exotic plants, minerals, and animals, in a vast and colorful fantastical world. Unravel the truth behind the great powers of the world and the secrets that rule everything.

name: Z Zombies: Battle Royale
description: A challenging battle royale that will test you and make you decide quickly and wisely! Shoot those pesky zombies and the other players in the arena as quickly and tactically as possible!

name: The Road to Recovery: A Personal 2D Adventure Game
description: The Road to Recovery places you in the shoes of Ash, a recovering addict, starting at day one. Awoken by the sound of your phone ringing, you have ZERO memory of the night before. Explore Oakborough City, and "survive" day one!

name: Relic Odyssey: Ruins Of Xantao
description: Fight off disgusting beasts and enemies, drill for resources, search for ancient relics, craft technology and upgrades, and use a glove with special abilities! Follow the team as they search for an ancient relic lost long ago in this hand-crafted, story-driven sci-fi adventure packed with action!

name: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: The Case of Banker's Final Debt
description: This mysterious case involves the murder of Oswald Mason, found dead at home. Lestrad and Scotland Yard believe that the murder was a result of Mason disturbing a burglar. I have my doubts. The Treasury wants us to investigate the case as Mason was dealing with sensitive Treasury work at the time.

name: Dream Pinball 3D
description:
Dream Pinball 3D is a port of the PC pinball game Dream Pinball 3D. It includes all six tables: Knight Tournament, Monsters, Dino Wars, Aquatic, Spinning Rotors and Amber Moon.

As well as the original score based mode from the main game, this port also includes a Mission Mode exclusive to the Nintendo DS.

name: Residence
description: Kailin does her yoga training every day to stay fit for her upcoming sexfights. However today Yanmei took a place on Kailin’s spot….and it was a mistake. Girls start to argue who is the best here and whose body is more fit.

name: Agent Heart: Deception
description: Join Agent Steve Heart, an experimental augmented military operative, in a thrilling episode of deception, mystery, action, and seduction. Embrace your fate and experience an unforgettable journey filled with relentless challenges and the promise of future conflicts.

name: Screen King
description: Screen King is a grid-based puzzle game where you need to merge your tiny LCD screen with the other LCD screens in the level and be the last one standing.

name: RoboRancher
description: RoboRancher is a first-person open-world co-op game with touches of exploration. In which you can capture and raise adorable monsters and get the resources they generate to improve your facilities, enter the planet and discover the secrets that await you.

name: Haunted Mansion
description: Hunt treasures in spooky manors!, evade ghosts, and unravel secrets.

name: Aleph
description: Aleph is a cube that stores human information and anthropomorphic images, starting from the space station and eventually arriving at the ruins of the dilapidated city, looking for the cube scattered everywhere and digging up the information in it...

name: Wrangler
description: A turn-based sex RPG.

name: Nightshift
description: Feel the retro vibes of the ‘80s with the colorful experience of NIGHTSHIFT - an 8-bit visual and playable arcade experience! Make your way on the highway, collect all the cassettes, boost your speed and reach Synthecity!

name: Only One
description: Immerse yourself in the chilling world of Only One, a spine-tingling horror experience that will leave you trembling with fear. Explore the depths of a haunted mansion, where darkness reigns and secrets lurk in every corner. Uncover the truth behind the paranormal occurrences.

name: Replay Boys
description: Band emergency! This was supposed to be Hannah’s day off, but now she’s been roped into managing The Replay Boys, an up-and-coming boy band. Make choices to stoke multi-timeline romances, keep the band from killing each other, and fight a resurrected ’80s pop star ghost. Can you manage?

name: Nūr
description: Nūr is a heartfelt 2D adventure game with hand-drawn visuals that takes players on an emotional journey of imagination, empowerment, and resilience.

name: Casino of Desire
description: Casino, money, beauty girls, desire, everything is superficial, hidden behind a huge conspiracy.

name: Grand Tactician: The Civil War - Whiskey & Lemons
description: Start your own Career in the American Civil War. Create your character and sign up to fight for the Union or the Confederacy. Write your story through the war, and become one of the legendary commanders of the American Civil War!

name: Set Sail!
description: Set Sail! is a top-down, 4 Player Couch Co-op Pirate Party Adventure. Adventure with up to 3 friends and learn the ropes of being a pirate, sailing your ship, collecting treasure and fighting monsters, menaces, or each other, with our PvP system Desertion...

name: Deathless
description: Deathless - a cooperative Action Roguelite game. Battle with friends against endless waves of enemies! Intense fights and tough choices await as each minute decides your fate. Unleash unique abilities and strategies!

name: Last Wish
description: "Last Wish" tells about a girl Chris, all of whose wishes begin to come true. But with maximum cruelty. Magic? Or do those who started the game have names? To find out, Chris will have to play by someone else's rules - make wishes again and again.

name: Blackout
description: Blackout is a hardcore co-op zombie shooter where you become a future special forces team and must overcome mysterious monsters and living corpses. Experience devastating action and extreme teamwork. It's up to you to complete the mission and eliminate the ruthless monsters without fear of death

name: Serum Run
description: A dogsled Oregon Trail-like originally made in 48 hours.

name: Arcane Depths
description: Arcane Depths is a 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler game with a magical world. Become a powerful sorcerer and dive into dangerous depths filled with enemies and treasures. Combine a multitude of spells and relics to annihilate your foes. Procedurally generated dungeons, intense combat, and powerful bosses awaits!

name: Pokémon Volt White 2 Redux
description:
Pokémon Blaze Black 2 & Pokémon Volt White 2 are essentially the sequels to my Black & White hacks known as Blaze Black and Volt White. The usual rules with my hacks apply; the main feature is that all 649 Pokémon are available for capture somewhere in the game, and the trainers have all had their rosters changed in order to maintain a much harder challenge than the original game, as well as having an increased variety of opponents to fight. There's also a large amount of alternative features these hacks offer, which range from differences to the Pokémon themselves to the presence of a couple new TMs. If I'm not mistaken, these are also the first Black 2 and White 2 hacks on offer.

Additionally, the two versions only differ in terms of their aesthetic differences, such as the appearance of Opelucid City, the title screen, etcetera. So basically, just pick whichever colour takes your fancy!

name: Binary Non-Binary
description: Top down puzzle where you control both characters with the same input.

name: Summit: Virtual Pro-Wrestling Gamma
description:
-18 new characters
-Combo system reinstated
-Shootfighting system reinstated
-Move changes, including bringing back the corner Razor's Edge from WCW/nWo Revenge
-New menu backgrounds
-New story for Road to WrestleMania mode
-New edit mode costume items
-Changed themes for some of the new wrestlers

name: Argonavis: Kimi ga Mita Stage he
description: Argonavis: Kimi ga Mita Stage he is a band-raising mobile game for the boy band project from ARGONAVIS. It features a new band, ST//RAYRIDE, and was released on February 7th, 2024 to Android and iOS devices.

name: Fabricationist DeWit Remakes the World
description: After a sleep of centuries, a synthetic being receives an unexpected visitor—along with a new role in the Great Project.

name: Cobra Command / Sol-Feace
description: Sol-Feace / Cobra Command is a bundle consisting of Sol-Feace and Cobra Command for the Sega Mega-CD, released only in Europe. The two games were released Japan and the United States separately.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2
description: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 is bigger and better than ever with all new gameplay, campaign, characters, voiceover, modes and more!

name: A Mother's Inferno
description: A mother loses her son on a train and must confront the five demons of loss in order to get him back. You play as the mother in this disturbing and uncompromising vision of a train ride gone to hell.

name: Knot Pharmacard Subcondition-J
description: Sin descripción

name: Marbloid
description:
Travel through the Vaporwave and reach the Exit – MΔRBLΘID is a 3D marble racing game like no other!

Play the restless mind of an entrepreneur, captured in a magical marble who needs to reach his ultimate goal: The Exit!

name: Battle Tea
description: Battle Tea is a simple yet competitive word game where you fight against your friends until there's only one man standing. Play up to 8 players, or find people to play online. Are you tea master you may think your are?

name: The Legend of Zelda: Gerudo Exile
description: A romhack for Link to the Past with an edited overworld and new dungeons

name: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling - Special Edition
description: The special edition of Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling comes with a drama CD and bonus booklet.

name: Fuukan no Grasesta
description:
"Grasesta, City of Interception", capital of the Kingdom of East Gohdia.
The city was built atop the subterranean labyrinth known as the "Black Pit", a remnant of the once thriving Demonic Lands of Samara, whose infamous name has been carved deep into the annals of Western history.
