In order to defend the holy barriers keeping the "Blockaded Expanse" sealed up, the city, being the central hub of retaliation against the most fearsome of the Demonic Lands, requires vast amounts of manpower to be brought in to replenish its forces in the ongoing onslaught.
These reinforcements consist primarily of slaves that were sold from other countries and mercenaries that flock to the area in search for a chance at fame and fortune, soon turning the city into one whose populace had only one thing on their mind: treasure.
Our protagonist, "Judar Schwarka," is one such slave that's been sold to Grasesta due to being captured after a lost battle. To win back his freedom, he will have to step foot into the twisted landscape of the Blockaded Expanse...

name: Cook, Serve, Delicious: Re-Mustard!
description: The million-selling cooking sim is BACK in this all new re-imagining of a classic! An all new campaign, expanded music, new foods and art, and new gameplay modes round out a celebration of the ten year anniversary of this massive series.

name: Maze IV
description: Move through 20 levels of castles, pressing buttons to raise and lower the water or make things vanish! Can you find the finish, collecting as many gems as possible on the way. The game has hundreds of secret areas. Can you find them all?

name: Point 236
description: Your task is to capture back a curative spring. Many enemies attack you, all in full 3D environment.

name: WickedWhims
description: WickedWhims is a mod for The Sims 4 that offers sexual and nudity interactivity, enhanced relationships with extended personalities and attractiveness, playable adult careers, and many more gameplay additions.

name: Null Space
description: 1 single player level. A large wood and stone structure frozen in the void. You've just arrived here to be greeted by a less than friendly reception.

name: Valhalla
description: Valhalla is a map by Edward Cripps (Ed), released in 2010. It has a dark, industrial theme which reminded some reviewers of Doom 64.

name: THT: Threnody
description:
Ty Halderman, the essential pillar of the Doom community, passed away in 2015. He is greatly missed and his contributions to the Doom scene have helped keep this old game alive and kicking. This project tries to honor Ty with levels that pay tribute to his work be it in the form of his levels or contribution to the Boom sourceport.

There are 20 levels in this megawad along with plenty of new music and awesome new, original skies! The project also uses a big part of Team TNT's The Return and Final Doom: Evilution resources.

name: Plutonia Revisited Community Project 2
description: Plutonia Revisited Community Project 2 (PRCP2) is a continuation in the series of Plutonia-inspired megawads. During Plutonia 3's development, there were a handful of great maps that didn't quite fit in a Plutonia 3 megawad but would fit great in a PRCP megawad. So PRCP2 was started! PRCP2 is not as classic as PRCP or Plutonia itself, but we dare say the spirit is very Plutonian and fun to play.

name: Nyomi Wants a Job!
description: The greater being Nyomi wants a job in order to upgrade their form!

name: WonderfulWhims
description: WonderfulWhims is a standalone mod for The Sims 4 that offers plenty of social, relationship, and pregnancy enhancements in the forms of Attractiveness, Impressions, Personality Archetypes, Menstrual Cycle, Birth Control, and many more.

name: The Lion King: Operation Pridelands
description: Operation Pridelands is a video game inspired by The Lion King. It was released on March 11, 2004, by Disney Interactive Studios.

name: Basemental Drugs
description: Basemental Drugs is a collection of functional drugs for The Sims 4. It features custom drugs, custom animations, altered walkstyles, altered moods, altered needs, come-ups, peaks, comedowns, hangovers, addiction, rehabilitation, and loads more.

name: Artilerry F
description: Sin descripción

name: Johnny Bravo in The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!
description: Step into the world of Johnny Bravo, the most well-known stud in cyberspace! Compete against other rivals in various events to win a coveted date with a sultry siren on the ultimate dating show, the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama! Will you emerge victorious and capture the heart of the lovely lady?

name: Basemental Gangs
description: Basemental Gangs is a mod for The Sims 4 that add gangs to the game. It features rivalries between gangs, micromanaging your own gang members, use gang members as drug runners, run your operations through your own gang headquarters, exclusive new opportunities from your right-hand man, and much, much more.

name: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game
description: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game is an exhilarating skateboarding game that features meme characters navigating levels filled with obstacles. Customise your skateboard and perform stunts to earn points. With its vibrant art style and intuitive controls, it offers a fun arcade experience suitable for all skill levels.

name: Arcade Archives: Growl
description:
"GROWL" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Choose one of the four rangers to control and save the animals from the evil poachers.
Use weapons you can pick up along the way, such as swords, guns, and rocket launchers, as well as a variety of techniques that you can perform by combining buttons to defeat the poachers.

name: Construction Machine Simulator 2023: Hard Truck Work Job
description: Become the owner of a bustling construction site: take control of powerful heavy machinery and a team of professionals!

name: Rotate the Rings
description: This is an exciting puzzle game where the player needs to solve different challenges by rotating the rings to find the gap.

name: L for Logic
description: Guess the logical chain and connect the images in order.

name: Just Get Z
description: Just Get Z is about starting at A and getting to Z. clicking to match two similar letters together to get to the next letter for you to get on top of the scoreboard. Simply match A's with colorful tiles together to form B's, while matching B's to C's and so on till you get to Z. Challenging right? The higher alphabet you match, the greater you keep going on top of the scoreboard. As you play, the lively colors on the screen brighten up your mood and the sweet music soothes your ears keeping you in a kind of meditation mode making you concentrate and focused, but this fascinating game brightens the brain cells to the core.

name: 90 Seconds
description: You have to reach the exit within 90 seconds in levels with tough obstacles. With its ease of playing and stage designs with plenty of action spy cars will save the world thanks to you. Both race and action are waiting for you. 5 cars are available for you to select. Drive whichever you like and collect golds. With its lifelike car checks you can choose out of two different checking options.

name: Lion Pig: Frozen Run
description:
Lion Pig: Frozen Run is a free-to-play endless runner / platform adventure set in a beautiful pixel world. It's time to put on your running shoes because Lion Pig is ready to race through the Frozen Valley! Run and jump as fast as possible while avoiding traps such as giant snowballs and crystal shards. Be careful not to fall down a snow pit while gazing upon the frost-covered trees and mountains as the sun and moon pass over the horizon. The game has a beautiful retro style and some charming winter music you will surely fall in love with.
This is is the ultimate test for your racing skills. Upgrade your score multiplier and keep running to earn the highest score on the Leaderboards!

name: Down the Hill!
description: Down The Hill is a unique and fast-paced arcade game that will keep you hooked for hours. The goal of the game is to descend from an infinite hill, while avoiding many obstacles and enemies, and grabbing stars and power-ups.

name: Goofy Insanity
description:
Get in your flying car and take to the air! The city’s traffic cruises down its usual sky-borne lanes, but these wild racers have decided to go in the wrong direction! Take control of one of many unique and colorful vehicles in a traffic-dodging trial against time.
How long does it last? Until you crash. Ranging from a gung-ho granny ready to prove her mettle to an anxious teenager uncertain about the future, these quirky characters are waiting to run the race. Avoid police, garbage trucks, school buses, and more, and see how long you can stay in the sky of this futuristic city. Keep racing to try to beat your time, and earn coins to unlock new characters and cars.

name: Death Mile
description: DeathMile is a Co-Op Multi-Player driving/shooting game where you blast your way through Mars!

name: Clumsy Cat
description:
You are a cat. Your owners left you alone. Do as much damage as possible before they get back. Destroy four levels - the house, museum, school, and mall.
Play as a lovable ginger cat or upgrade to one of the other playable pets. Wreak havoc with a Siamese cat, fat cat, beaver, bull, cow, dog, goat, lion, koala, monkey, pig, pony, raccoon, and more!

name: Rainbow Rockets!
description: Rainbow Rockets is a purpose built 2 player game to enjoy with friends! With it's unique colour matching control system you'll be addicted in minutes as you start tilting your device to match all the colours of the rainbow to set off your rockets! If you struggle you can always try the tap edition and race against your friends using either version!

name: Pixel Sweepers
description: Welcome to Pixel Sweepers. A classic, throwback mines game with a twist.

name: Baja or Bust
description:
From the makers of Motocross Elite comes a whole new game, Baja or Bust—inspired by Mountain Dew Baja Blast, a legendary DEW flavor at Taco Bell that’s finally available in stores, this summer only!
Race through 12 worlds of amazing environments en route to the ultimate destination: Baja. Get on the podium, complete tricks and finish worlds to earn points!

name: Lunar Racer
description:
Strap on your moon boots and fire up your nitro boosters because the real space race is about to begin!!

Shoot, dodge, blast, and nitro boost your way through the solar circuit. Achieve the ultimate prize and conquer the solar system by beating any competitor in your way!
From the creators of Super Stickman Golf.

name: Chrome Death
description:
Chrome Death is a hardcore, minimal action game about escape.
Survive for as long as you can in a cyberpunk city and avoiding the CORP AGENTS that have one goal: your destruction. Defeat your friends, earn credits, buy cars and work together with drivers across the world to unlock secret vehicles!

name: AiCaterine
description:
A fan game for AiCaterine, the magical time-traveling elf!

AiCaterine found a mysterious artifact that sends her into the far future. Help her repair the artifact and return to her own time!

name: The Sims 4: Extreme Violence
description: The Sims 4: Extreme Violence is a mod where you can perform violent interactions and murders. Turn violent and beat sims up in different violent ways, kill sims in 40+ different ways, develop a horrible reputation by becoming the most hated and feared sim in town, and join gangs or start a feud with them.

name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
description:
LEGO Batman offers a unique gaming experience on the DS platform, with new features and characters. Players control Batman and Robin as they work together to defeat enemies and save Gotham City. Each chapter consists of five levels, with a variety of gameplay styles, including platforming, puzzle-solving, and vehicular combat.
Players can unlock new characters and abilities, and explore secret areas to discover hidden items. The game features co-op play, allowing players to switch between Batman and Robin at will. Additionally, certain characters have special abilities that allow them to access previously inaccessible areas.
With dozens of unlockables and multiple playthroughs available, LEGO Batman offers plenty of replay value for fans of the franchise.

name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
description: The fun of LEGO, the drama of Batman and the uniqueness of the combination makes for a comical and exciting adventure in LEGO Batman: The Videogame. Play as Batman and his sidekick Robin as you build, drive, swing and fight your way through Gotham City capturing escaped villains including The Joker, Penguin, Scarecrow and more. Then, jump into the story from the other side and play as Batman's foes! Enjoy the power you wield and battle Batman while spreading chaos throughout the city. There is no rest for the good (or evil!).

name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame
description: Sin descripción

name: Knightmare Gold
description: A fanmade remake of Konami's legendary Konami game Knightmare.

name: Love Death
description:
In this pixel art platformer inspired by Takanashi Kiara from Hololive, it's up to you to find a way to die in each level.

How long will it take you to complete the 60 levels?

name: Project Stratarch
description: Project Stratarch is a movement FPS designed around wall jumps, rewarding good movement on top of good aim. There are two game modes, both completely kill-based: Solo Deathmatch (Free-For-All) and Team Deathmatch.

name: Spellsword
description: Spellsword is an interactive web-based game designed to improve our command of the English language.

name: LEGO Batman: The Mobile Game
description: Sin descripción

name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret
description: Experience the thrilling adventures of George of the Jungle, a classic side-scrolling platformer reminiscent of Pitfall! As the fearless George, you'll navigate through a lush jungle environment, dodging hazards like mischievous monkeys and treacherous pits. Be careful, though - some obstacles can be deadly, so keep a sharp eye out for danger. But don't worry, George has got some tricks up his sleeve too! Swing from vines and collect precious eggs to boost your progress. Just remember to stay safe and have fun!

name: Kung Fu Panda: Legendary Warriors
description: Get ready to unleash your inner Kung Fu master with this exciting new adventure featuring Po and the Furious Five! Using the stylus, you can harness your skills and battle against the evil Tai Lung.

name: Luigi's Final Ghost Hunt
description: This is a mod for the original Luigi's Mansion that takes place in the future with an old Luigi, new ghosts, and a new mansion as well.

name: Luigi's Mansion: Premium Deluxe
description: An expansion to the original Luigi's Mansion for Nintendo Gamecube with a brand new revamped and redefined experience! Play Luigi's Mansion like never before and experience brand new features including things like toggling the blackout, removed on disc content, new overhauled graphics, quality of life features, and much much more!

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli
description: Sin descripción

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli
description: Sin descripción

name: Mother: Encore
description: A re-imagining of Mother with all new content, tweaks and remastered visuals. The soundtrack features remakes from the original game along with brand new pieces! The battle system is also built from the ground up to give each battle a more polished experience. The story adds more depth to the characters you love. The maps have no dead-ends or pesky mazes, and the world is filled with countless little touches to really bring Eagleland to life.

name: Super Luigi Wii: The Emissary
description:
SLWii: The Emissary is a a complete revamp of Ultimate Super Luigi Wii that was released in a rush and unpolished state back in 2020.

Based around Newer SMBWii, The Emissary stars Luigi in an adventure heavily inspired from Super Smash Bros Melee and Brawl with custom music, models and inspirations coming from those respective games.

name: Gun Trails
description: Gun Trails is an overhead shooter inspired by genre classics. Players must shoot down enemies while dodging dense waves of bullets, but are able to make use of a hyper laser by building up long combos of enemies.

name: Yogi Bear
description: Embark on a wild adventure as Yogi Bear, the beloved park mascot of Jellystone Park! Gather delicious picnic baskets as you journey through the park, using your quick reflexes and cunning wit to outsmart your opponents. With a variety of exciting gameplay mechanics, including jumping, pounding, gliding, skateboarding, and zip-lining, you'll need to think fast and act faster to succeed. Plus, unleash your creativity through fun mini-games to craft one-of-a-kind gadgets that will give you the edge you need to triumph over your foes. Get ready for a thrilling ride filled with laughter and excitement!

name: Tumble Tundra
description: Tumble Tundra is a Foddian Platformer where you must escape a mysterious crevice that you've fallen into. Will you be able to make it to the top?

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - Spearhead 1944
description: Grab your rifle and prepare to deploy to the fields of Normandy. This new addition will take you back to historic World War II, fighting alongside the US First Army in Normandy, and introduces new vehicles, weapons, clothing, gear, co-op campaign, and more.

name: Only Cum!
description: You have an important challenge ahead of you to climb to the top! However, if you succeed in doing so, you will receive a very satisfying reward.. The most realistic animations and 3D models are waiting for you to Only Cum!

name: Evasion from Cluster 42
description: Evasion from Cluster 42, an arcade space-shooter for 1 or 2 players with 3D GFX and a Background Story. Play every level from top down view or from side view. You'll get a different view and a different experience that way for each level!

name: Exo-Leviathan
description: A lone pilot sent to the main asteroid belt, your task is to collect carapaces, dragon remains. But beware, they might not take too kindly to you collecting them. A short sci-fi, first person, indie, thriller/horror game. Triggers my Thalassophobia.

name: The Haunted Hospice
description: The Haunted Hospice, You got yourself stuck in the hospital while you where searching for your friend. Are you capable and smart enough to escape from the hospital and save your friend? Remember that you are not alone in the hospital there is always danger lurking.

name: Fantasy Up
description: Join Alf in "Fantasy UP!" in a world upended by a gravity-reversing Demon King. As Alf, ascend, gain experiences, and aim to defeat the Demon King. This RPG tests determination, with average completion of 30-60 minutes. Every fall strengthens you. Ready to climb, Alf?

name: Simple Tower Defense
description: A suuuper simple tower defense game with a suuuper simple perk tree.

name: 1989 QianShanMen
description: In a distant realm, there lies a mysterious and beautiful country known as the Winter Country. Currently, Winter Country is under the control of a political party called the "Dongshan Party"... And on Winter Calendar June 4th, 1989, an event unfolded at the QianShanMen Square...

name: Hyakki Yako: OH&S
description: Haramita Renkai is trapped somewhere deep in the underworld after a ritual gone awry. Armed with naught but his wits, his talismans and a burning desire for self-criticism, Renkai attempts to flee the grasp of the ravenous Demon Parade and escape back to the mortal plane.

name: Super Mario World: The Lost Adventure - Episode I Remastered
description:
The remaster aims to improve the quality of the hack and have it be more in line with the later episodes. Here are the changes:

New levels
New Music
New custom graphics
New custom enemies
New custom bosses
New level order
Redesigned overworld map
Rebalanced difficulty
And more…

name: Romgadr
description:
This is a mini-game shmup.
Defeat all 20 mid-bosses.
When the last boss is defeated, it is the end.

name: Aonar
description: This is an immersive cinematic storytelling experience based on Scottish folklore. Become a part of the lighthouse keeper's story, and take a journey with him on the Scottish Isles. This is an exploratory application.

name: Chess Remix
description: Experience the thrill of playing Chess like never before with Chess Remix. Try out different versions of Chess from around the world, historic board games, modern variations or even create your own original games

name: Hop Step Sing! Shikiri Shiishiba: By My Side
description: This time the concept is “Let's hold hands”. While on a date with Shikiri by the seaside in midsummer, you can hold her hands, take photos and create a dream-like VR music video that fans will not be able to resist.

name: For Honor: Ocelotl Hero
description: Embody the Ocelotl, hunter on the battlefield, and defeat enemies with your macuahuitl and tepoztopilli.

name: Settlement Survival: Tourism
description: Settlement Survival: Tourism contains a whole new tourism system, with 9 attraction structures and 10 commercial structures. You can earn Silver Coins and Access Points from tourists, and increase Town Attractiveness to bring more tourists immigrating to your town.

name: Gloom: System Breach
description: A 3D sci-fi action adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a small robot controlled from a third-person perspective. We wake up in a non-working system, help to activate it by activating individual systems and fight opponents who defend the necessary parts.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Chara
description: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Chara is an Undertale-related mod for Friday Night Funkin' based around the character Chara. The mod features 3 new songs related to the character.

name: Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle
description: Kinny and the Star Track Puzzle is a story about the friendship between a cosmic witch and a shining cat head. Embark on a journey through space to illuminate the darkened stars and restore constellations to the world!

name: Choppy Heady
description: Choppy Heady is a short, intense horror game set in an abandoned children's camp. Trapped by psychopaths, your goal is to survive and escape. Navigate the environment, solve puzzles, and avoid the psychopaths. Can you make it out alive?

name: A Scoundrel in the Underlair
description: Head out into the woods and find the dreaded Underlair in this traditional turn-based roguelike.

name: Stress Chess
description: "The real chess was the friends we made along the way." - Randy Mc'Chess

name: Kitten Force FRVR
description: Join a squad of Space Kitties and Break Blocks with your PAWsome Lasers!

name: Cosmic Salvage
description: Embark on an interstellar journey in 'Cosmic Salvage,' a thrilling 2D platformer game made in Unity. Become the intrepid astronaut who crash-lands on an enigmatic and treacherous alien planet. Stranded far from home, you must navigate through perilous landscapes and cunning adversaries to retrieve the vital components needed to reignite your plasma engine.

name: Utsurogami
description:
The main character is a young boy who works for the wealthy Kito family.
The game has two stories, the second of which can only be accessed by picking exact choices.

The first story is about a series of mysterious disappearances of young girls from the same school, which the protagonist investigates with the help of the Kito family's daughter.

Second story is about the village's mountain and coal mine, where an unknown yokai is apparenty roaming. This story features two unique main characters who do not appear in the first. It's also far more sexual and less complex, with each character having a single, straightforward ending.

name: Save the Settlers
description: This is a tower defense game in which you have to defend a settlement from bloodthirsty creatures.

name: Ore to Mahou no Koibito
description: Me and My Magical Boyfriends stars Simba, a magician in training; searching for love. Using the Spellbook of Almagest in hopes of acquiring a boyfriend, he accidentally summons four men from different worlds. With inspections approaching within a month, if Simba doesn’t return them home in time, he may be forced to renounce his magicianship. [From vndb.org]

name: Bouga Kyoukai
description: In a mountainous town there is a serial murder case with all the victims' necks cut off and either heads or bodies taken away. Main character is a student from a parallel world who claims that his twin brother and sister heads got replaced in early childhood. Normalcy and absurd come together in this investigation.

name: Ryuusei-gou ni Notte
description: This supplementary game is devoted to five side-characters who never got their routes before.

name: Sengoku Rance: Sanbiki ga Kittari Tsuitari Moyashitari - Slash! Thrust! Burn!
description: Suzume's past comes back to haunt Kanami as a Silver Eye Sect ninja named Kakusui steals Kanami's Decapitation Blade and plans to get revenge on Suzume and Inukai over the death of her leader, Gumo Danjou by using its abilities to become stronger than Suzume. The chase is on, as Kanami, Suzume and Senhime work together in order to get Kanami back her Decapitation Blade.

name: Hotel Renovator: Steampunk Furniture Set
description: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Introducing the Steampunk Furniture Set, a DLC that brings retro-futuristic elegance to your Hotel and embraces Victorian aesthetics infused with advanced machinery.

name: Hotel Renovator: DLC Pack 1
description: Customize your hotel with new sets of furniture and rooms! Expand your inner designer experience with this DLC pack and gain access to 6 DLC featuring amazing decoration items that will make your hotel stand out from the rest.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Northern War
description:
A smartphone RPG based on the anime The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki - Northern War.

In addition to the story of the anime, the mobile game will feature an original story and new characters. The tactical orbment system “ARCUS II” introduced in The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III will also be implemented. Players will be able to explore the world while progressing through the story, and experience the “pure emotion and exhilaration” of the Trails of Cold Steel series’ battles on mobile devices.

name: Planet 51: The Game
description: Nintendo DS port of Planet 51: The Game.

name: Planet 51: The Game
description: Wii port of Planet 51: The Game.

name: Top Spin 2
description: Nintendo DS port of Top Spin 2.

name: Top Spin 2
description: PC port of Top Spin 2.

name: Top Spin 2
description: Legacy cell phone port of Top Spin 2.

name: Planes
description: Disney Planes is based on the 2013 animated movie of the same name. This handheld version has gameplay similar to the PC / Wii (U) release, but is not identical. Players get to experience the game world using six characters and six environments (four less for each compared to the other version), but it does have full voice acting. Each character has different statistics based on boost, power, speed and technique. The game contains four game modes, but not the multiplayer portion of the other release. The included game modes are: Balloon, Challenge, Race and Story.

name: Planes
description: Nintendo 3DS port of Planes.

name: Blocxlide
description: Blocxlide is an arcade puzzle game where players must quickly and strategically slide blocks to create miniature art. Including a puzzle editor and "shuffle" mode, endless brain-scratching challenges await, where only the most efficient will triumph with top grades.

name: Hunters
description: Stompin' Mech Squad!

name: Eelbay
description: Mix and match cute eels to fulfill deliveries!

name: Planes
description: Wii port of Planes.

name: Metaverser
description:
Metaverser is a revolutionary new virtual world that offers players the opportunity to explore, create, and interact in a vast and immersive 3D environment. The Metaverser platform is the first of its kind, allowing players to seamlessly switch between different gaming platforms while still earning rewards and progressing in the game.

One of the most unique features of Metaverser is its play-to-earn system. Unlike traditional games where players have to spend real money to purchase virtual items, Metaverser allows players to earn rewards by simply playing the game.

name: The Simpsons Game
description: Nintendo DS port of The Simpsons Game.

name: The Simpsons Game
description: Wii/PS2 port of The Simpsons Game.

name: The Simpsons Game
description: PSP port of The Simpsons Game.

name: Lost and Damned
description:
Resident Evil-inspired modification, featuring basic mechanics from classic RE games, such as static camera, inventory, tank controls and more...

Players find themselves in a mysterious mansion, full of zombies, headcrabs and other dangers. With limited inventory and movement, escaping the residence of evil horrors will not be an easy task.

name: Harmonic Time-Bind Ritual Symphony
description: A musician's manic episode binds fiction and reality into a joyful union.

name: F-14 Tomcat
description:
F-14 Tomcat is a port of Absolute Entertainment's 1994 SNES game Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone with some GBA exclusive content.

It features a multiplayer mode between other systems and a brand new storyline: the player controls a F-14 pilot chosen by the US government to be assigned in the theater of operations of a war between the republics of China and Taiwan to protect America's "interests" in the region.

name: Mobius Final Fantasy: Warrior of Despair
description: Act 2 of the RPG Mobius Final Fantasy, which added new characters, new jobs and a new scenario quests.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail
description: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail is the fifth expansion pack to Final Fantasy XIV Online. The expansion will bring an abundance of fresh content, including an increased level cap, multiple new jobs, sprawling new areas, new allied tribes, new dungeons, and new core battle content such as FATEs, Hunts, Treasure Hunts, and sidequests, and much more.

name: Ratatan
description: Ratata Arts and TVT have announced Ratatan, a new rhythm action game from the creator of Patapon previously teased as Project JabberWocky.

name: Dixie Kong Country
description: A mod that replaces Donkey Kong with Dixie Kong, along with her gliding abilities.

name: Wandering Fighter
description: Published in 2005 by Migami, Wandering Fighter was an above-average platform title in its time.

name: Untitled Star Fox Minihack 2
description:
Sequel to Sunlit’s Untitled Star Fox Minihack.

One route, 6 Stages, mostly planets. I can’t speak for the difficulty, but if you can beat the original Star Fox, this shouldn’t be terrible. Also lots of added-in dialogue. It was fun to write that stuff.

name: International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus
description: The project will be the final evolution of a definitive ROM for the game, bringing unprecedented gameplay improvements and maintaining the already consolidated improvements in skills with team characterization (Jorge Guimarães) for the use of the game in online competitions: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus”, modification based on the previous project: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (SA)”.

name: Doki Doki Hell's Kitchen
description: World renowned Chef Gordon Ramsey came to your club to show you the beauty of the culinary arts! He's here to educate, motivate and tell you how to make the best cupcakes. Will Gordon have enough patience for these mouthy high schoolers? Can the club members take the heat of the kitchen? And most importantly... where's the lamb sauce?

name: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror
description: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror is a major Super Mario 64 ROM hack created by Rovert, which contains 15 custom-made courses and 120 stars waiting to be collected. With a unique in-depth story, original characters, and new mechanics, this SM64 ROM hack will provide a traditional yet unique experience.

name: Water Spirit
description: Water Spirit is three maps I have made for a year, with lots of enemies and detailed architecture. The feel is intended to be slightly moody, but with lots of action and danger that will test the player.

name: Travelling to the Moon
description: Travelling to the moon is a boom compatible map that was designed in about 5 months (maybe a bit more) and it is a rather large map (it was intended to be short/medium at first though).

name: Man on the Moon
description:
"Man on the Moon" is a boom compatible map that was designed in about a year (on and off, give or take a few more more months) and it is a rather large map.
It serves as a sequel to my previously released "Travelling to the Moon" and, this time, well as the title suggests, it actually takes place on the moon (at least some moon). It has more of a focus on set pieces and incidental combat rather than a succesion of arena fights.

name: Tangerine Nightmare
description: Tangerine Nightmare is a collection of 8 (+1 credit-map and a bonus one) limit-removing maps. They were designed by the french doom community, with all new textures/GFX/flats made by franckFRAG.

name: Violence
description: A four map short episode based around the colour purple. Meant to be a nice relaxing "sit back and play Doom" set.

name: Voidspawn
description: A somewhat small and uncomplicated map for Boom (-cl9).

name: Terminal Stages of Nostalgia
description: A moderate-to-large single map for vanilla Doom II.

name: Altitude
description: One large City themed map designed for Vanilla/Chocolate Doom with multiple possible routes and a lot of optionality.

name: Infinite Pinball
description: Give wiiings to your flippers and fly past the levels in this boundless pinball arcade.

name: Super Wario & The World of Wirio
description: "Ugh, not again! Scared to death while sleeping this year, too! Some meteor-thingy crashed into a mine nearby, and two Toads want me to check it out for 'em. I bring the meteor home, hoping I can get a bunch of hamburgers for it. But without me knowing it, it absorbs my DNA! And in the night, it creates a shadow clone of me! Luckily, the two stupid Toads are out for a walk when they see this shadow-me. They overhear his plans, and finds out he calls himself for Wirio (how original), and that he is going to return to his own world and prepare to lay our world in shadows. Oh, and that he has 5 shadow-generators or something that will protect him. And after hearing this the next morning, the Toads want me to go into Wirio's world and stop him, blablabla. The only reason I go, is because of treasure...and to stop that thief who stole my good looking face!"

name: Infinite Pinball
description:
An addictive pinball game that could make you play forever.

Tap to hit the ball and shoot it up. The farther your ball goes, the more bonus scores you get. Be careful with the breakable glass flipper and try not to be bounced down.

name: Five Nights at Wario's 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Wario's 3
description:
The third and final chapter in the Five Nights at Wario's trilogy, where you find yourself in a big mansion, hiding in different rooms every night, while you try to find your way out.

This game features a new mechanic never before seen in a FNAF game, being hiding. You choose between 2 different rooms to hide in, every night, with each night having its own mechanic and own characters. A total of 12 nights, Easter Eggs, and more!

name: Team Fortress 2: Summer 2023 Update
description: The Summer 2023 Update, also labelled as simply Summer, was a major update for Team Fortress 2 that was released on July 12th, 2023. It introduced 14 new maps, 25 new cosmetic items, 10 new War Paints, 6 new taunts, and 20 new Unusual effects in total (12 for cosmetics and 8 for taunts), as well as a new community-created game mode: Versus Saxton Hale.

name: You're Not Actually Supposed To Die (At The Tournament Of Death)
description:
You're stuck in a submarine with five ridicolously rich people. The submarine don't work good. What will you do?
I resisted the impulse of making this a dating sim btw. Which I should be praised for.
It's a game. I don't know what else to say about it. The bulk of it has been written while mildly sleep deprived.

name: Every 10 Seconds I Find New and Exciting Ways to Hate Myself
description: Sin descripción

name: My Stomach Hurts and Things Will Never Get Better and I Want to Puke
description: A short game about stress eating.

name: Absolute Silence: A Game Album
description: Sin descripción

name: The Life of a Magical Circle
description: The Life of a Magical Circle is a deceptively simple evade-and-collect game about following your dreams. Take control of a circular creature and see if you can figure out your purpose with only a little help from a mysterious narrator.

name: Defy the Omphalos
description: A trio of glitched out Doom II maps from The Shareware Vats crew.

name: Octate
description: The first Doom map from Mr. Hypnos, inspired by and dedicated to the memory of John W. Anderson (aka "Dr. Sleep") and the legacy he left behind.

name: 1 Bad Wad
description: 10 short, quick Boom speedmaps + 1 credits map with a solid colors theme

name: DIY
description:
DIY is a community project aiming to create maps out of solid color textures. It was originally conceived by xvertigox based on "One Bad Map" release.

The maps were ultimately arranged roughly in order of increased difficulty. By the end they turn very hard.

name: Idol
description: Idol is a small work-in-progress mapset for Doom 2, designed to be played in limit-removing ports.

name: 50 Monsters
description: 50 Monsters is a project I started back in 2014 when I was just really getting into mapping. It got a bit out of hand in the second half of development, and as such the final product is fairly inconsistent in terms of overall quality. Still, though, it was a good learning experience and I enjoyed creating it.

name: Maybe Valentine's Day Isn't The Worst
description: A gay visual novel made by Dudebulge

name: Kingsguard
description: Kingsguard is considered a non-linear visual novel so your choices will bring about changes to the story, open up new dialogue, and even affect the ending. To fully understand the story and piece together the mysteries the characters will face, you must play each of the three character paths that will take you to a different corner of Torvair. The choices you make will have consequences and effect the story in various ways.

name: Soleil
description:
The direct sequel of: The Water is Wide.

Many people have tried to find the key to eternal life before, but... This isn't what this game is about. Play the part of Coco, a mysterious ex-orphan trapped inside a world where death exists no more, and where every single human has been blessed with the gift of immortality... if you consider that to be a gift, of course.

Join the main protagonist and their friends in a quest to find the truth behind the strange condition that has been bestowed upon humanity. To make everything the way it was before, or to do nothing about it... That depends on you.

name: Tubaruba
description: Sin descripción

name: Siemb Chronicles: Arkos The Traitor
description:
Caberhi Tram, elite commander of Emperor Shakar's military forces, is a legend in the Ururben galaxy. Even in the service of the evil intergalactic ruler, his adventures across countless worlds have made him a hero to the oppressed.

Following his legendary quest to find the three galactic tombs that ultimately spelled the end of the empire, his adventures are told in whispers and tales, in palaces, cantinas, markets, and homes across the galaxy. A series of adventures that are collected in the "Chronicles of Siemb".

name: Kirizaki-kun wa.
description: In the classroom of the protagonist, Moriko Taka (changeable), a strange transfer student, Kirizaki-kun, has arrived! Moriko's days with the strange Kirizaki-kun are about to begin.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin 14
description: Taiko 14 is the first arcade to feature the alternate scoring method, Shin-uchi Mode, which awards points based on the number of notes you hit and not the notes you hit in a row. You can alternate between regular and Shin-uchi Mode, however the high scores for both modes are different, and Shin-uchi Mode scores are not recorded.

name: Deep Breath
description:
Deep Breath - a short mapset at the bottom of the ocean.

In this project, our little green hero steps through the entryway airlock of an underwater base, the H.A.D.E.S (Hydro Atomic Deepsea Experimental Science) Facility, to find that demons are running rampant. Our mission: get to the heart of the Facility and activate the self-destruct protocol. Hopefully Doomguy can make it out alive, or at least sink down to a watery grave with all the monsters.

Greatly inspired by AD_79's map 05 from Tetanus by Squonker Team - the ingenious mechanics and visuals used in that map made me think of other potential ways in which to continue that narrative and visual thread.

name: 1000 Lines Community Project
description: A 34 map megawad made for vanilla Doom 2, made by the community with a strict line limit of 1000 lines.

name: 1000 Lines 2 Community Project
description: A 34 map megawad made for vanilla Doom 2, made by the community with a strict line limit of 1000 lines.

name: 1000 Lines 3 Community Project
description:
We have 32 totally awesome vanilla compatible maps for you (+ 2 bonus maps), powered by a vanilla friendly version of Otex1.1.

The episode themes this year, I feel are pretty interesting, unique and hopefully people will enjoy them.

name: Pumping Station
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required. Dynamic light must be enabled.

name: Shadow Zone
description: This minipack consists of three levels, two of which are redone old levels, and the third is completely new. Mouse look is supported but not required. Music taken from Quake II by Sonic Mayhem.

name: Outer Base
description: This is a small map with a good design, stuffed with blood and gore.

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Jollyball
description: Making toys is hard work, and even Santa's elves need a break. Thankfully, the North Pole Elfletic League gives everyone at the Workshop a workout. The Winter Invitational is underway, giving all of Santa's helpers the chance to be crowned seasonal champions of the North Pole's most popular 2-on-2 sport: Jollyball. (It's like standard volleyball, only much cooler.) The teams are ready, the net has been set, the Power-up Presents are primed, and there's fresh snow on the court — are you ready to sleigh the competition?

name: Disintegration
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. All difficulty levels are supported. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: Temple of Blood
description: All difficulty levels are supported. Mouselook is recommended, but not required. For correct perception, the dynamic lights must be turned on.

name: Refinery Complex
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Growing Light
description: Patch 6.5 introduces: new main scenario quests; the third installment from the alliance raid Myths of the Realm, Thaleia; a new trial, The Abyssal Fracture; a new dungeon, The Lunar Subterrane; a new Crystalline Conflict map, The Red Sands; a new Variant and Criterion dungeon, Aloalo Island, and more sidequests and sidecontent.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Parsec Man 3D
description: Parsec Man 3D is a minimalist action platformer shooter game published in 1994 on DOS.

name: One Week at Flumpty's
description: One Week at Flumpty's was the original third and final installment of the One Night at Flumpty's series, but it was later canceled and the name was repurposed into the One Week at Flumpty's trilogy of shorts.

name: Hi-5: Let's Play
description: Hi-5: Let's Play is a CD-ROM game based on the Australian TV series Hi-3 released in 2003 by Dataworks.

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: An LCD version of Plants vs. Zombies that was included with the Burger King kids meal for a limited time.

name: Anger Birds
description: Anger Birds is an unlicensed clone of the mobile game Angry Birds that is bundled in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: Plants vs. Zombies is an unlicensed port of the mobile game of the same game that is bundled in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: Risker
description: Risker is an unlicensed clone of Mario Bros. that is bundled in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: 50 Blockbuster Games Volume 1
description: 50 Blockbuster Games Volume 1 is a compilation game by Nodtronics released in Australia.

name: 50 Blockbuster Games Volume 2
description: 50 Blockbuster Games Volume 2 is a second compilation game by Nodtronics released in Australia.

name: NS-Shaft
description: NS-Shaft is an unlicensed port of the game of the same name included in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: The One Way Challenge
description: A platformer game where you can only move forward, left and right. You play as a ball rolling through levels and getting through obstacles. Seemingly nothing is wrong at least.

name: PonyGuessr
description: Guess the episode each My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic frame is from.

name: Sudoku
description: This popular logic puzzle is a numbers game, minus the math.

name: Touch Sudoku
description: Touch Sudoku is a handheld touch screen sudoku LCD game by The New York Times.

name: Gekihaden
description: A unique side-scrolling shooting game in which all the graphics other than the background, such as your own plane and enemy planes, are written in kanji. Players use lock-on lasers and regular bullets to complete a total of 7 stages with a wide variety.

name: Logan Paul Adventure
description: Logan Paul Adventure was an unlicensed 2D platformer for Android devices based on Logan Paul.

name: Hedonistic Offering
description:
A former occult magazine editor, who had just been dumped by his girlfriend, suddenly lost his memory after drinking at a gay bar in Shinjuku, and found himself lying on a strange tropical beach.
The island is Shishia Island, a penal colony for homosexual felons in the Meiji era, and he is told that he is one of them.......

name: Escape from the Darkness
description: Your name is Alex Johnes. You're one of scientists caught up in the Black Mesa disaster. After being trained in a special Black Mesa self-defense course three months ago, you're unwilling to accept the sure death as your destiny. You will neither let the troops catch you, nor will they wipe you out. Make your way. Find Gordon Freeman. He is the last hope that drives you traveling on...

name: Frontline Force
description: In Front Line Force the players are divided into two teams: Attackers and Defenders. The object for the Attackers is to capture various Capture Points spread throughout the map. The object for the Defenders is to defend those points. Once a point is captured by the Attackers it cannot be taken back. The round is over when either the Attackers capture all the Capture Points or when the round time runs out, in which case the Defenders win. After the a team wins, the roles of are switched. If you were previously attacking, you are now defending, and vice versa.

name: Sandpit
description: Sandpit is a sandbox mod for Half-Life.

name: Hostile Intent
description:
Hostile Intent focuses teamwork, communication, and realism over a run and gun playstyle.

Hostile Intent for all intents and purposes is the thinking man's First Person Shooter. In Hostile Intent the player has to use cover wisely, conserve his ammo, work well with his teammates, use communication effectively, keep the mission at the forefront of his mind and especially keep his cool under fire.

name: BooM
description: You can't play BooM... Boom plays you!

name: Syndicate Black Ops
description:
The action takes place after the Dark ages (in a far future). You are a member from the Syndicate, a powerful criminal group specialist in assassination and delicate missions.

One of the more powerful mega corporation : Croon, contact you so that you "clean" their little error : Inadvertently they opened some hell's gate and the Federation send its choc troops in order to pacificate all of these things and to bring some proofs against Croon.

name: Tour of Duty
description: Tour of Duty is a realistic team play mod for Halflife by Valve Software. The game is set at the height of the Vietnam war, between 1967 and 1973 allowing you to relive the conflict fighting either for the United States Marine Corp (USMC) or the Viet Cong (VC)/North Vietnamese Army (NVA).

name: Stargate: TC SG-1 Missions
description: SG-1 Missions is a singleplayer modification of the older known Stargate TC multiplayer mod, it delivers hard 11 missions that take place in the Stargate universe.

name: Refracted Reality
description: 15 maps of gothic/abstract glory. Linear and non-linear layouts, high detail, color in abundance and great gameplay making use of advanced port features. (GZdoom 3.7.2 or higher required)

name: Liberosis: Protosis
description: Sin descripción

name: The Settlements
description: A set of 3 maps with an emphasis on exploring surreal environments. Some bits may had challenging combat and traps. Mostly non linear progression. This mapset its a spiritual succesor to Liminal Doom aesthetics in some ways.

name: 10 am Break
description: 5 quick maps for your 15 minute morning break from work.

name: Senses in Decay
description:
After the "resonance cascade", the H.E.C.U spread to almost all the sector of Black Mesa. The sector A was the most closest to the surface, that's why our protagonist manage to escape so easily.

John White escaped in a car, but he stopped in a storage facility of Black mesa. He destroy a vent to find supplies, but he find himself trapped in that supply room. The only way to escape is crossing all the F,G,H sectors of Black Mesa to the principal entrance.

name: Crypts of Eternity
description: A journey into a decrepit castle and crypts.

name: Doomkid
description:
Doomkid posted a bu﻿nch of midis a few years ago stating "Re-tuning and remastering of MIDI files I've found on the net. These should be perfect for DOOM ﻿maps. Enjoy!" so I made some Doom maps.

14 Maps + Secret Map + End Map based around the midi song names. Mostly ~5-10 min each. Slaughter adjace. Skill settings implemented. Tested in DSDA and EE. Boom CL9 compat.

name: Sniper Rush
description: Immerse yourself in an epic action experience with your friends with our exciting first-person shooter. Get ready to embark on a limitless adventure in the sky and on the ground. This game will take you to an astonishing map where freedom of movement is absolute! Enjoy thrilling flights, sprint at full speed, and jump like never before thanks to an innovative hook that allows you to reach inaccessible places. Fun and excitement are guaranteed in this gravity-defying shooter! Are you ready for action?

name: Touhou Dream Runner
description: A one button rhythm action game that Youmu beats her enemies(?) to the beat.

name: Fatal Hearts
description: Fatal Hearts is an English-language visual novel/adventure game in which players control a teenage female protagonist who is having strange dreams while people are being murdered. It was released in October 2007 for Microsoft Windows.

name: The Tale of Dragons and Oceans
description: The Tale of Dragons and Ocean is a fast-paced boss rush game where a mother must defeat four huge dragons to retrieve her son's soul from the sea by throwing a spear and pulling the enemy's energy through a rope while dodging their attacks.

name: Toing's Pops
description: Toing's Pops is a singleplayer survival horror game, you must run and hide from Toing while uncovering the information needed for your escape. Amidst all the chaos, just remember why you came...

name: Biscats
description: Biscats is an upcoming visual novel with erotic themes and female empowerment. The player follows the events after the homonymous comic where Katetoo, an underground tattoo artist from the center of São Paulo, will share her adventures of independent sex and sexual freedom.

name: Trollface Quest: Video Memes & TV Shows
description: Trollface Quest is a game series in which the player has to complete levels on unusual ways while the game tries to troll the player. This game features 39 levels that are parodies to video memes and popular TV shows.

name: Trollface Quest: Video Games
description: In this game of the Trollface Quest series the player needs to beat 10 levels referencing famous video games like Doom, Assassin's Creed and Goat Simulator.

name: Stand and Fight
description: Stand and Fight is a mobile game where you are a character who can control the spirits of his ancestors and use the power of his traditions to protect his town's June festival, which is under attack by a large corporation.

name: The Dreamer Must Die
description: 'The Dreamer Must Die' is an RPG shooter where you're the only hope for a fading dream world. Advance the story, find new equipment, and improve your character within the mind menu to ensure your survival.

name: Duas Vidas
description:
The year is 2032, Brazil has suffered a coup d'état in which a president supported by a fundamentalist militia has taken over the country.
Paulo and Júlia, two young black people from a fictional ghetto in a fictional city in a future that is, unfortunately, getting closer and closer to reality, have to make decisions in a single day that can impact the rest of their lives as well as the millions of people around them. And who will make those decisions? You.

name: Farm Colony
description: Farm Colony is an upcoming farming simulator RPG where the player controls an alien who is taking care of the planet that was mistreated by the former inhabitants while developing relationships with other races and cultures.

name: Block Room
description: In Block Room, you need to escape the dangers and collect the apples that serve as a shot to unlock the path to the next level.

name: Lunr.Rdio.Taxi
description: lunr.rdio.taxi combines the precision of rhythm games with the excitement of a futuristic racing game. Pilot your ship through a mind-bending cylinder that pulses to the beat of the music. Dodge obstacles in time with the soundtrack and master the art of "Drifthm" mode for insane score multipliers. Can you handle the rhythm and the risk?

name: Zaum Gadget
description:
Billed as an "interactive cyber event," this interactive hypercard stack is said to have been found by by creator Amendant Hardiker among some Babelian ruins dated back to 9999 BC, then deciphered from a since forgotten machine language. It is thought that Zaum Gadget was a subliminal event-structure capable of subtly manipulating the beliefs of any participant.

Inspired by Russian futurism, Zaum is a unique digital experience.

name: Cyber Storm Edge
description:
Fast-paced 2D Retro Side Scroller Platformer! Fight against Cyber Space Pirates!
Attack and shoot through the stages and defeat each stage boss.
A total of 5 stages, and one unlockable character, one time trial per stage, and one No-Damage challenge per stage.
